name: Push That Cat!!
description: In this game you will learn how to effortlessly move your feline friend across space and time.

name: Anata ga Ookami Card Death!
description: Accuse and execute the owner of the werewolf card. It's a 5-minute round of a repeated death game in the werewolf genre.

name: Power Champions
description: Explore the universe and protect Zarion from evil invaders led by the fearsome KillDeath. Join the Champions of Power, the most powerful heroes of the universe, to combat destruction and madness in an epic adventure and action game !

name: Land of the Vikings
description: From victuals to Vikings, lead your village and expand it into a thriving city. A wise Jarl must manage resources, survive harsh conditions and enemy raids, and guide their fellow Vikings to work together through social conflict. Skál!

name: Towelket One More Time: Kemono
description: The world has already ended. The protagonist, Okappa, wakes up to find her home overrun by killer beasts. She meets Shinshi, a white rabbit who will guide her through this ruined world. Meanwhile the other protagonist, a young Tanuki named Tantanuki begins his new life at PonPon school, a cheerful school that specializes in teaching machinery to beasts.

name: A Day With Mochi
description: In A day with Mochi, you play as Mochi, a young cat who has just arrived on the tropical island of San Felicete. You must help the local cats and fill up your photo album with Polaroids by making mischief. Interact with your world, charm the people (or make them angry), make a mess and escape to the rooftops...

name: Dragon Court: Revived
description: Dragon Court was originally a game released around 1997 as a Java Applet, but became abandonware around 2017. By using Internet Archive's Wayback Machine, much of the game was salvaged, and through the use of cheerpj framework, it was brought back to life for modern browsers.

name: XStinger
description: Stinger is a tank-shooter with several enemies, levels, power-ups and items to pick.

name: PSP1G: The Incident
description: A fan game made for PSP1G the streamer.

name: Bill Rambeard's Rad Bad Blasterball
description:
In this block breaker game inspired by 1976's Breakout, you play as Bill Rambeard at the heights of his powers competing in the fast-paced, razzle-dazzle world of Blasterball.

Bill is joined by a cast of characters who will help you along by playing polka as you break through the procedural-generated puzzles. Your only goal is to get the highest score you can!

name: Re:Mobilize Jam 1: Re:Collections
description: A jam held from August 1, 2023 to October 1, 2023, featuring 4 maps all making use of the Re:Mobilize mod and its signature movement-based mechanics!

name: Educational Suite
description: "Explore a world of fun and learning! Educational Suite offers engaging mini-games to help kids develop essential skills. Join the adventure now!"

name: The Puzzle of Blocks
description: Infinite challenges, millions of innings with different levels of difficulty.

name: Dagon: The Railway Horror
description:
Have you ever wondered what the master of weird fiction and cosmic horror might have dreamt about?

Now you have the opportunity to immerse yourself in one of H. P. Lovecraft’s nightmares, which he described in 1927 in a letter to Donald Wandrei - a co-founder of the famous Arkham House publishing house.

So validate your ticket and find a comfortable seat - the motorman will be arriving shortly.

name: Survival Nexus
description: Survival Nexus is an exhilarating survival game that immerses players in a post-apocalyptic world filled with challenges and dangers.

name: Rising Dead
description: Survive a zombie-infested mall for 3 days. Fight, scavenge, rescue, and customize your character in this dynamic game.

name: First Steps
description: Unite with friends or compete against them in our sci-fi themed Third Person Shooter! Enjoy 3 game modes - Free for All, Team Death Match, and Capture the Flag. Master various cutting-edge weapons. Host or join online lobbies for endless multiplayer fun!

name: Chef Showdown
description: Activity selected co-op cooking rush game apart inside of Discord's Nitro program.

name: Chicken Brother
description: Exploring in the huge sinkhole, you can transform from a chicken to a muscle man, by jumping, gliding and climbing from the bottom of the sinkhole to the outside world.

name: Higatana
description: Sin descripción

name: Reshoot Proxima 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Noisz: Episode G
description: Noisz Episode G is the second story expansion for Noisz, exploring the tale of Gaius Antiphon long before the events of Ignition and re:||VERSE with 6 brand-new stages! Challenge new and old content with the tricky mechanics of Proto Style, further expanding your Style Lab possibilities, and earn more achivements and titles!

name: Hao x Sora: The Sky's Abound
description: Ride beyond imagination in Hao x Sora: The Sky's Abound, the first action title in the Project Natura series. Rise as a hero out of their time and into the future of Natura, chasing down a old villain with unimaginable speed. Change the board - Equip a garage of hoverboards to store between runs and apply to different situations. Chase the world - Risk it all and choose when to end your run - either preserving your boards or bailing for a hell of a finish.

name: Super Mario Starlight
description: Super Mario Starlight is a solo project that takes a unique spin on a traditional hack. The game has a hub world that lets you explore and find levels freely, but the stages themselves are linear, like a traditional Mario game. Think Peach's Castle from 64 with about 20ish linear stages instead of open world stages. Yoshi Coins act as the main collectable. The more you collect, the more levels and areas of the hub world you will be able to access.

name: Frasier Fantasy
description: Frasier Fantasy is a loving tribute to the show "Frasier" in turn-based RPG form. Filled with Easter Eggs and callbacks, this is the game for anyone wondering if Eddie ever blinked first.

name: 60 Minute Marathon
description: You've heard of wads with three hour maps. You've heard of wads with one hour maps. But here today we give you a vanilla, 32-map megawad made entirely in one hour and streamed on twitch.

name: Domino Draw
description: Draw the domino path!

name: High Cars
description: Dangerous driving high in the sky!

name: Freak Hunter A Retro Type: Bonus Level Pack
description: Dozens of fun levels await you in this dlc package. It promises you pleasant hours with its interesting section designs.

name: Sex Apocalypse 2
description: Conquering the apocalypse has never been so vivid and emotionally charged! Welcome to the world of Sex Apocalypse 2 – the second installment of a unique third-person shooter.

name: Noisz Re: Collection G
description: Noisz Re: Collection G is a massive all-in-one collection of Noisz content, featuring 40 action-packed stages and 3 story campaigns which mix the visual novel format with intense rhythm battles! It's time to face the music like never before.

name: Hyper Gym Life 3D: Tough Guys
description: Take the first step towards the pinnacle of the fitness world and good health!

name: Aquapark io: Complete Edition
description:
Complete Edition Features:
- 15 large maps with slides
- 50+ funny skins, 11 floaties, 13 gliders
- multiplayer mode up to 4 players on one screen!
- opening packs with random skins
- spawning mysterious powerups during the game
- catchy holiday music
- easy controls so anyone can play
- simple rules and lots of fun!

name: Chick-Chick
description: You play as chickens who have to survive on unstable platforms in various universes of the chicken coop, will you be able to keep the balance and hold on, compete with friends and beat the record!

name: Dungeon 3D
description: The ultimate 3D Virtual Tabletop, Dungeon 3D is light-weight, incredibly easy to use, and extremely robust. It has everything you could possibly need to run full sessions, create gorgeous 3D maps, access character sheets, initiative, dice rolling, animated and customizable avatars, and so much more!

name: Recordbooks
description: 'Recordbooks' is a Photorealistic bodycam first-person tactical shooter . You will play as a secret agency agent whose duty is to solve Complex and Mysterious cases of your duty area .You will need your detective and tactical skill to solve these complex cases. Get ready to show your skill.

name: Ultrazone
description: Take control of the soldiers to guide them and restrain the enemy forces

name: Small Aircraft
description: This is a classic flying shooting game with exquisite and simple graphics.

name: Mind War
description: Mind War "is a role-playing game with national warfare gameplay. Players will play the role of wandering between countries to achieve success, with detailed game graphics, cool skill effects, and exciting battle scenes, creating a grand battlefield between countries for you.

name: Sole Seeker
description: Land on unique planets to survive the horrors that await in this adventure survival RPG. Use the spoils to upgrade defensive buildings and explore the galaxy further. Can you survive the hunt all alone?

name: Zombie Sniper Shooter: Stickman War
description: Shoot for Salvation: Your Bullets Are Humanity's Only Hope Against the Undead!

name: Last Lesson
description: It's your first night as the caretaker of a scary quest. The last visitors have gone home. You need to turn off the lights, check the equipment and not die of horror, because someone or something suddenly starts a nightmarish game. With you in the lead.

name: Space Dogo
description: Space Dogo is a platform/adventure game. Moro is an old trained dog searching across the galaxy for her owner who has been kidnapped after some enemy attack to the Human Colony.

name: Steel Titan
description: Take control of a powerful mech with over 40 unique weapons to fight your way through a confidential computer system and defeat the hackers inside.

name: Spectral Trail
description: In this pseudo-3D action FPS, try to survive a maze full of ghosts in your search for the Seven Rings of Xeoncor.

name: Outbreak
description: Zombies. Sabotage. A stolen cure. Do you have what it takes to outwit – and outlast – hordes of enemies as you fight for survival? Get ready for Outbreak, the newest adrenaline-packed adventure from Zero Latency VR.

name: Hexed
description: Can you build and fight through endless levels to bring life and color to your world? Customize towers and troops to ward off enemies in this fast-paced and colorful tower defense.

name: Goodnight Universe
description: A micro audio game to fall asleep with about the heat death of the universe.

name: Loona Landa
description: Gotta save all them cute little bunnies!

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Deluxe Edition
description: The culmination of the Sword Art Online game series, Last Recollection features the largest roster of SAO playable characters and sub scenarios!

name: Persona Collection
description: Experience the power of Persona today!

name: Halloween Stories: Black Book Collector's Edition
description: Your plans to have a fun Halloween night in with your little sister quickly turn dark when she's kidnapped by a nightmarish specter! With the line between your home and the supernatural world blurred, can you save her in time?

name: House of Jigsaw: Impressive Animals
description: This expansion introduces a new dimension to the House of Jigsaw series, combining the enigmatic challenges of Jigsaw puzzles with the awe-inspiring power of the animal kingdom.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
description: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Brush Burial
description:
Brush Burial is a lo-fidelity First Person Snatcher.

You play as Fennel, a knife-wielding swamp devil with an eye for gold and a penchant for violence. Use your tail to toy with your prey: grab and fling objects, climb impossible heights, and knock your enemies off balance.

name: Steampunk Voyage
description: Gather you Jetpacks and your sense of spirit for adventure and embark on this mystical journey of steampunk!

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
description: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Resonite
description: Enter a novel digital universe with infinite possibilities. Whether you resonate with people around the world in a casual conversation, playing games and socializing or you riff off each other when creating anything from art to programming complex games, you'll find your place here.

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Complete Edition
description:
In this complete collection with Horizon Forbidden West and Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores DLC, take on more awe-inspiring machines, meet new tribes, and travel to the treacherous archipelago of Los Angeles!

Horizon Forbidden West: Complete Edition will be available for $69.99 USD / €59.99 / ¥7,980 and includes:

Horizon Forbidden West for PS5
Burning Shores DLC for PS5
Digital soundtrack
Digital art book
Horizon Zero Dawn Vol. 1: The Sunhawk digital comic book*
In-game items:
Extras in Photo Mode (special pose and face paint)
In-game items unlocked via story progression:
Carja Behemoth Elite outfit ·Carja Behemoth Short Bow
Nora Thunder Elite outfit
Nora Thunder Sling
Apex Clawstrider Machine Strike piece
Resources pack

name: College Sex: Episode 1
description: A visual novel series about the sex life of two college girls. In this episode, they just arrived at their dorm.

name: Fakeway
description: Dig, fight, collect, and explore. If you like Terraria very much, you can try this game. It will also give you a different experience.

name: Project Chimera
description: We will save humanity by our knowledge. We need to just immerse in this environment.

name: Lovey Dovey
description: As the #1 toilet fan, you visit an abandoned toilet factory in search of the legendary golden toilets. However, you're ambushed by the factory's friendly mascot, Lovey Dovey. You're at an extreme disadvantage since the only thing you brought is a rocket launcher. Collect all 69 toilets then escape!

name: Le Corps-Glitch: Multitudes
description: In Le corps-glitch (multitudes), multiple becomings occur. It is a virtual reality experience that highlights potential and future bodies to merge with the Other, change skin, slowly morph into a hybrid being that connects with plant, animal and technological species.

name: Red Barrels Go Boom
description: The world is overrun with zombies! They are fast and they are immune to bullets! The only way to kill them is EXPLODING BARRELS!

name: Shelter in the Doomsday
description: This game is a 2D platform game mainly focused on defense and adventure, with some storyline tasks, as well as collection and construction.

name: SchoolLife
description: Satirize some educational systems

name: Ucube Avcıları
description: An absurd comedy-focused turn-based adventure

name: The Paper Aircraft of Childhood
description: How far can a childhood paper airplane fly.?

name: Blue Ribbon Bake Off
description: Blue Ribbon Bake Off is a new, original playing card game. Players work to gather ingredients to complete a recipe and win a blue ribbon at the county fair. Competitors use every trick in the cookbook to stop them. Who will be named the County's Best Baker?

name: Asagos
description: - 1916: The Canadian Parliament - As the Great War incites fear and suspicion, lead an investigation into the heart of Canada's government. But beware of who you trust. What lies within the depths casts a shadow upon the stars themselves.

name: Kem Alpha 1
description: You get a call to go to your friend's house, but then things start to take a horrible turn....

name: Wind Ryder
description: A comedy, romantic dating sim, masquerading as an adventure RPG.

name: Little Splash
description: Little Splash is a 2D precision platformer inspired by the classics you love. Here you play as an agile protagonist who will splash paint all over your path, are you ready to make the cleanest run possible?

name: Sex With Toys
description: Sex With Toys is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Vox Populi: Poland 2023
description: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for the Polish parliamentary election of 2023! In "Vox Populi: Poland 2023", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Hot Dog Reporter
description:
Hot Dog Reporter is a (very early access) game about a hot dog in a hurry.

It's a fast paced platformer with a speedrun mode that will eventually turn into a metroidvania with a mystery to solve and charmingly weird characters to meet (and a speedrun mode). Once the linear levels are iterated on enough to finalize Hot Dog Reporter's mechanics, gameplay will begin to spill onto the sprawling, interconnected city streets of New Yorkshire City.

name: Ambusher
description: Ambusher is a tower defense game. Set your traps. Build your towers. Prepare your defense and survive until sunrise.

name: Vogvhathos
description: As an elf in a panicked flight from home, you discover a more dangerous secret; a human claiming to be a dragon.

name: Cactus Simulator 2
description: Cactus Simulator 2 is a game in which you can become a cactus.

name: Land of Crystals
description: Embark on a journey of exploration in Land of Crystals! A captivating collectathon RPG through a whimsical world filled with healing crystals. Collect and cleanse your crystals to save the island from the attacking monsters and overcome your vulnerabilities!

name: Guardians Of Gaia: Guardians 8
description: Guardians of Gaia: Guardians 8 is an introduction to the combat and game mechanics of Guardians of Gaia. Are you ready to take up the challenge?

name: Hepo
description: The first volume produced by Gemini Hirono. The hero determined by playing rock, paper, scissors defeats the demon king. RPG format where you move around the map and defeat enemies It is a 2D STG. Score Attack allows you to move around the map automatically and play only 2D STG.

name: English Is Hard_
description: An arcade style typing game that evokes the nostalgia of Missile Command. Defend your cows, shoot aliens, and go for the high score!

name: Helle's Undersea City Project: Bringing Air to The Garden
description: Grow and expand the land with air, aiming to rebuild the undersea city with a lone girl, Hele! A new type of undersea city-building simulation game!

name: Turbo Dash Kart 2023 Racing
description: Race to Glory, Race to Win – it's time to conquer the track!

name: The Castle Mystery
description: A first-person horror game where you step into the shoes of a historian who, on a solo mission, receives a tempting invitation to explore a long-abandoned castle. Drawn by the promise of a generous reward, you accept the offer without hesitation.

name: Freaky Trip
description: Put your imagination to the test and go on a freaky rescue trip. Help rescue Salcy’s beloved cockapoo from unknown danger in which she was sure to find herself. In Freaky Trip you will encounter many logical puzzles, which you can find everywhere.

name: Noblesse Oblige: Legacy of the Sorcerer Kings
description: Noblesse Oblige: Legacy of the Sorcerer Kings is a high fantasy RPG that reenvisions turn-based combat in dynamic ways, telling the story of Alexander—an idealistic yet pragmatic nobleman—and his allies as they navigate politics, intrigue, ruling, and love amidst a tempestuous civil war.

name: Raioh
description: Raioh is a retro style shot and bomb style vertical scroll shmup.

name: God's Forest
description: God's Forest is a Roguelite Bullet-Hell. Gather powerful items and weapons, battle the guardians of the dungeon, and maybe even make a few friends along the way!

name: Modern Air Combat: Beyond Visual Range
description: Fire long range missiles and fly through mountains in close aerial combat to fight in PvP with friends or against bots in huge 400 km x 400 km world.

name: Persevera
description: Intoxicated by the philosophy of absurdity of Albert Camus, you wake up malnourished in a torn medical scrub with a suitcase handcuffed to your left arm and thousand open questions. In your pursuit of truth and answers, you encounter various daring quests, technical riddles and hazardous chases.

name: Sneaky Peeky
description: Time for being stealthy! Dive into the shadows of Sneaky Peeky and experience real multiplayer stealth action. Use the environment to conceal your presence and avoid getting caught. Find ways to disrupt enemy team. Discuss your strategy and be sneaky!

name: Mazepocalypse
description: Choose your character and shoot through zombies in this retro dot-collecting maze arcade game for 1-4 players! Featuring multiple ways to play, tackle one of the game's 6 unique scenarios in Campaign mode, or shoot for the hi-score in Arcade mode!

name: Step By Step
description: In a game where you can't stop moving, every step is progress. But whether that progress is forward or backward, that is up to you...

name: Float
description: A aimless rafting trip, anything possible will be your boat. Tiny boats will be swallowed by fast-flowing rivers, but mighty boats will stand firm. When encountering danger, do you choose to avoid it or bravely overcome it? Use your ingenuity to make this journey go further!

name: Hot Candy Land
description: A 9 to 5 desk job is not really your thing? Go grab your smart phone, start filming and get ready to fulfil your destiny as the King of the Adult Industry in this crazy classic tycoon parody!

name: Triplets Trouble!!!
description: Triplets Trouble!!! is a visual novel slice of life about a father and his triplets in a period shortly after the pandemic. Each game played by the children became a mini-game, in a short narrative over seven days in the life of this family.

name: Horn Sounds
description: Your task is to destroy all enemies on the map. Farms will provide you with provisions, with which you can hire new soldiers. Gather squads, hire new soldiers, capture farms... All this will help you win!

name: Mini Continental Saga
description: Mini Continental Saga is a biotope strategy history card game letting you freely stir small worlds! Human, elf, slime? Or lead your fishman to create your favorite fictional world! One play takes 5 to 30 minutes. Weave a tale that you've seen somewhere before, but doesn't exist anywhere else!!!!

name: Fort Solis: Limited Edition
description: The limited edition physical version contains a special 3D cover and an exclusive metallic effect postcard.

name: NHL 24
description: NHL 24’s all-new gameplay features bring authentic on-ice action to life. Experience the rush and fatigue of a high-pressure game with the Exhaust Engine, where sustained pressure in the attack zone leads to new game-changing effects like goalie fatigue that slows the netminder’s reaction time the more they get worn down with offensive action; change the momentum with Physics-Based Contact as you break the glass and send players into the bench with big body checks; and get unparalleled player command with the new Vision Passing System and Total Control Skill Moves. Chel is more connected than ever with cross-play in all online team play modes, along with HUT Moments, which lets you recreate classic moments in hockey history and today’s biggest plays. Adding an extra layer of authenticity, Flex Moments introduces 75+ new goal celebrations, and a wholly refreshed presentation complements an enriched crowd atmosphere that makes playing the game feel like you’re at the game.

name: Rapis the Bullet
description: It is a Danmaku shooter ...... but the protagonist cannot shoot bullets. She only has a sword.

name: A Bite at Freddy's
description:
A Bite at Freddy's is a bite-sized Five Nights at Freddy's experience.

Freddy Fazbear's Grill needs your help to test and repair the Freddy Fast-Food Delivery machine! Work along the restaurant manager to ensure food orders can be delivered from kitchen to customer without issue.

Complete orders, repairs, and challenges!

name: Space Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Ontotis
description: Ontotis is a psychological horror game focusing on atmosphere, mystery and an engaging story. Uncover scattered clues to unveil the chilling fate of the house's residents, while encountering a mysterious humanlike figure seemingly connected to them in their haunting tale.

name: Draw
description: Welcome to the world of Draw, a 2D sidescroller and visual novel! Armed with nothing but a pencil, play as "Stickman" as you explore a brand-new world. Solve puzzles by drawing into the game, meet new friends while dodging scribble monsters, and make memories that’ll never be erased!

name: Jinsei Game for Nintendo Switch
description:
Create your own avatar, refine its parameters and grow yourself! The jobs you can get will change depending on the parameters!
There are various jobs, such as office workers and doctors, which automatically rank up if you meet certain conditions, and baseball players and idols, which rank up by successfully playing roulette.

name: Sunsoft Collection 1
description: Sunsoft Collection 1 brings together six classic games from the renowned Japanese developer. Includes Mr. Gimmick, Blaster Master, Blaster Master Boy, Aero the Acro-Bat, Journey to Silius and Arabian.

name: Delphine Software Collection 1
description: Enjoy three stunning Amiga classics and a console gaming legend from the cinematic masters of home computer games, Delphine Software. Travel through time in Future Wars, unravel an international mystery in Operation Stealth, make first contact with an alien race in Another World and recover your identity in Flashback!

name: Intervallic
description: In this 2D sidescrolling rhythm game use your MIDI instrument or computer keyboard to guide a robot alien cat through space!

name: Enter the Slayer
description: Enter the Slayer and engage in fast paced, skill based, exciting isometric directional combat! Build your strength, customize your character and slay your competition! Fight to the top and experience challenging content that will test your skill!

name: Kit's Quest
description: Kit’s Quest is a challenging, fun-filled 3D platformer featuring a brave fox on a journey to rescue his sister from a menacing dragon! Explore a huge, interconnected world, collect magical dragon teeth, and learn cool abilities as Kit treks toward Skyreach Summit to save the day!

name: Vosphia
description: Vosphia is a singleplayer RPG set in a medieval fantasy world. Encounter various enemies to fight, build your own base in the world of Vosphia, craft numerous items, and explore the vast world of Vosphia.

name: Ghost at Dawn
description: Explore an abandoned hotel and search for clues while trying not to succumb to your fears in this ode to 90’s survival horror games. You will solve puzzles, face off against supernatural entities, and use limited resources to maintain your sanity so you can explore deeper in The Pines Hotel and find out what really happened to Emi Kosuke.

name: Star Sign
description: Extend your arms to swing around and slingshot yourself across huge open levels in this fast 3D platformer. Discover a broken world and find your way back to the skies!

name: Halloween Store Simulator
description: Begin your Halloween empire building and managing your first Halloween Store! Manage your staff and products to attract new customers! Grow your Halloween empire by building Halloween restaurants, cafes, and entertainment! Expand and make every day and everything Halloween!

name: Ocnus Theory
description: Ocnus Theory is a challenging sandbox platformer that will test your creativity, reflexes, and ability to rise from a painful fall. Explore the mysteries of this open environment, shape your Ocnus to match the current challenge, and ascend to the peak! Just don't look down.

name: Speed Master
description: Speed is everything! Just go fast! Only one button needed. Accelerate and try not to crash. Single player arcade, daily online circuits, weekly online championships, split-screen local multiplayer and multiple cars to collect. May the speed be with you!

name: Aquarium Land
description:
Dive into an aquatic world where amazing animals await you!
Go fish in the sea, swim, catch species like goldfish, starfish, koi fish and add them to your fish tank to expand your aquarium shop!

Drive a motorboat, ride a jet ski or just jump in the water and dive with a friend in multiplayer mode!

name: Deadly Rain
description: Deadly Rain is a survival horror FPS game that puts you in a terrifying fight for survival against hordes of scary mutants in a rainy, abandoned village. Find and manage resources to stay alive in the worst and most unexpected situations.

name: Virtual Circuit Board
description: Virtual Circuit Board is the minimalist drawing-based logic simulator where you will design, program, decorate, and simulate anything from simple monochrome circuits to complex and colorful computers. Explore your creativity in this sandbox experience.

name: Midnight Girl
description: Midnight Girl is a 2D point-and-click adventure game. The game takes place in France during the Sixties. The story, mood, and style of the game are inspired by the city of Paris, Belgian comics and heist films from the Sixties.

name: Detective Pikachu Returns
description:
Solve mysteries with the personality-packed Detective Pikachu!

Unravel a series of mysteries across Ryme City with a tough-talking, coffee-loving Pikachu who calls himself a great detective. This Pikachu may have a self-assured attitude and talk like a middle-aged man, but he somehow manages to keep his lovable charm. Together with his partner Tim Goodman, this great detective duo cracks several cases with the help of the many Pokémon and people who live in Ryme City.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: The Forty Thieves
description: The Forty Thieves is a downloadable content expansion package for Assassin's Creed: Mirage, which follows Basim Ibn Ishaq as he investigates the legend of the Forty Thieves. Initially given to players who pre-ordered the game, it was later made available to all players on Ubisoft Connect for 60 units.

name: Disaster Town Tycoon
description: Disaster Town Tycoon is an Android simulation game developed by Rogue Harbour Game Studio Inc. As the newly elected Mayor of Disaster Town, you have to build a city of your dreams on the most accident-prone stretch of land on the planet. Your task is to mitigate the disaster damage and keep your citizens happy and alive.

name: Head Trauma
description: Head Trauma is a 6-level map miniwad (5 + ending) in Doom 2 - Boom format.These are somewhat cramped and slightly hard, each one loosely inspired by one of the five senses, with some homages to classic megawads like The Plutonia Experiment, TNT, and Going Down.

name: Drawing with Nat: Dream Diary
description:
Drawing with Nat: Dream Diary is a Yume Nikki styled exploration game featuring Nat!
Explore various dream locations to collect "Inspiration" which can be used to create drawings and also collect "Forms" which can grant you different abilities and change Nat's appearance.

name: Hell Revealations
description: Hell Revealations is a full-length megawad (33 maps + 11 bonus) created by The Slotter Team led by @Arsinikk. It is the unofficial sequel and successor to Hell Revealed and Hell Revealed II. For additional information about the megawad, check out the HRs Infopack included in the download!

name: Kuroobi
description:
Kuroobi is an horizontal shoot'em up for Playdate where you take on spaceships with your bare hands.

Get ready to show off your martial arts prowess in this action-packed game. Do you have what it takes to save the day with only your fists?

name: Heavy Trucking
description: Trucking sim for the Panic Playdate reminiscent of similar games from the mid-90s.

name: Satolite
description: Satellite is a Tower-Defense Game without a grid or slots for your towers. Instead, you place satellites in orbit around planets. Use the crank of the Playdate to determine where to launch your new satellite. Once the satellite is placed, it orbits the planet by itself.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage & Assassin's Creed Valhalla Bundle
description:
Play the two latest installments of the iconic Assassin's Creed franchise with Assassin's Creed Mirage and Assassin's Creed Valhalla.

Assassin's Creed Mirage: Experience the story of Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice as he navigates the bustling streets of ninth-century Baghdad. Through a mysterious, ancient organization known as the Hidden Ones, he will become a deadly Master Assassin and change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Become Eivor, a legendary Viking warrior raised on tales of battle and glory. Explore England’s Dark Ages as you raid your enemies, grow your settlement, and build your political power in a quest to earn your place in Valhalla.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 46 - Justice League Dark
description: A powerful curse is burning through the world's most powerful magic users, escalating their powers to dangerously violent extremes! Hoping Batman can take on the hard work, John Constantine's transported his House of Mystery to overlook Gotham Cemetery, where he and it are now under attack. In Justice League Dark Cursed, players will join forces with Batman and members of the Justice League Dark to put an end to this threat to all magic.

name: Terraformers + Tin Can: To Infinity, and Beyond Bundle!
description: Get two space games in one pack! Terraformers and Tin Can!

name: Monster Racing League: Phoenix Cosmetics Pack
description: Customise your monsters with this pack in association with Steve Spohn. Half of the proceeds of this pack go to The Able Gamers Charity.

name: Speediest: Car Racing Formula & Auto Sport
description: Rev up your engines and get ready for the ultimate racing experience in Speediest - Car Racing Formula & Auto Sport! Choose your path in the fast-paced world of motorsport as you take on the challenges of Formula and Autosport racing.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Ninja Runner
description: A ninja never stops training.

name: Dark American Horror Stories

Time slipped during a school trip in Kyoto,
it is a love game at the end of Edo period with handsome guys.

name: The Chase: Cop Pursuit
description:
The Chase is finally here. A thrilling and action-packed game that will have your heart racing! Prepare to unleash your inner speed monster as you take on the role of a driver who is being chased by the cops.

It's a challenging game in which you'll be immersed in a world of powered car races and exciting driving. Take control of a variety of customized cars and abilities, each with its own unique characteristics, and overcome your pursuers with your expert driving abilities. Explore smoothly created maps inspired by Eastern culture to give your escape ways a unique touch.

As you race through the maps you will come across power-ups that can give you a significant advantage in your daring escape. Keep an eye out for NOS to boost your car's speed and leave your pursuers in the dust. Additionally, strategically deploying mines can slow down police cars in order to earn victory.

Prepare to be on the edge of your seat with a captivating storyline that immerses you in danger, Can you escape the police? Prove your strength as an escape artist. Unlock additional characters to enrich your gameplay.

name: Arcade Archives: Darius II
description: Sample tuna sashimi in 3 screen glory!

name: Russian Pinocchio
description:
The story of Pinocchio began with the translation of Carlo Collodi's Italian fairy tale Pinocchio, but then developed into a completely different, author Alexei Tolstoy's story. He brought more adventurism and fun to the story and added many new details and changes.

The story was adapted for film, theatrical productions, and the tale itself was published in the USSR 182 times, was translated into 47 languages, and reached a total circulation of 14.5 million copies.

How different is Tolstoy's version from Carlo Collodi's tale, so unique is the graphic version by artist Ekaterina Volzhina! She retains Tolstoy's entire plot, but brings it to modern Russia! Her story is told without a single word, but with incredibly beautiful illustrations and love for the source material.

name: GalaxiA: Pilot Episode
description:
GalaxiA is a space adventure, inspired by classic Sci-Fi series and Japanese Adventure Games. The Pilot Episode is the first instalment of the episodic saga.

Follow the crew of the FSS Helen Thari to all corners of known space to rebuild civilizations, heal baleful wounds and reconnect with those lost in the dark. Explore a brand new universe and unveil forgotten dangers, new conspiracies and future enemies!

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Boomtown USA
description: The churning gears of commerce and extravagant consumption drive the city’s headlong expansion. Skyscrapers reach into the clouds while businessmen and socialites make merry in underground speakeasies.

name: Viki Spotter: Complete Bundle
description: This is a set of puzzle games from the Viki Spotter series that will bring out all your attention.

name: Clown Art
description: "Escape from Clown Art in a terrifying horror game. Solve puzzles and escape the nightmarish mansion before it captures you."

name: Cat Attack
description: JRPG similar to Final Fantasy/Lufia with an overworld and a variety of dungeons. Many party members with unique skills/abilities. Not early access, but will be updated in the future based on user input and other information.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Explore "Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles" and experience the mesmerizing beauty of our world from above. Solve captivating puzzles while discovering Earth's wonders in stunning aerial views. Unleash your inner explorer!

name: Internet Cafe Mini Games 10 in 1
description: Imagine an internet cafe that contains 10 fun little games. You can play any game you want in this internet cafe. Try to get the highest score in simple games by managing your character with a single button.

name: Idle Blocks
description: Idle clicker game with simple but really addictive gameplay. Destroy endless blocks and proceed as far as you can. Complex prestige system and upgrades with endless possibilities and pure fun

name: Neon Fantasy: Cats
description: Neon Fantasy: Cats is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Multiplayer Drone Simulator
description: Take part in breathtaking drone simulation in a realistic city with Multiplayer Drone Simulator! Enjoy the freedom in free mode, test your skills in levels, and drive drones with players worldwide.

name: Space Shooter 24
description: Join the war in the depths of space with Space Shooter 24! Customizable ships, realistic graphics, and breathtaking action await you. Take action now to save the galaxy.

name: JumpMan
description: ATTENTION: This game is nearly impossible to beat! A challenge only made for the strong-willed gamers out there and should not be taken lightly. You take control of a ball named Gaton. Prove yourself to Ludwig and complete all nine challenges. You'll then be qualified to partake in real missions.

name: Robot
description: This is a role-playing adventure puzzle game, a wonderful and unfamiliar world that requires thinking in order to continue moving forward, exploring the wonders of this game, overcoming various difficulties, and experiencing magical experiences.

name: Zonescape
description: You wake up in one of the prison cells. By chance, you end up with a key in your pocket that you can use to open your door. Escape from the most secure prison in the world!

name: Challenge Tour
description: This is a casual little game!

name: Megalothymia: Mokusei Zettai Bouei-ken - Heaven's Fall
description: This is a space fleet shooting game that can be easily enjoyed with FPS-like controls.

name: Slots Casino Game
description: Fortunes Turn with Every Spin – Slots Casino Game!

name: Double Trouble
description: Double Trouble is a dating simulator where every choice you make matters! You will have to become Scott, the manager of a small branch of a large company in a small town. Can you handle the hurricane of emotions, office intrigue and maybe even find love?

name: Wild Hunting
description: Immerse yourself in a virtual world of outdoor hunting in wild environments full of animals.

name: Bozalleth's Curse
description: Nightmares that wake you up in cold sweat. The world of dreams hides secrets and your sins. The game 'Bozalleth's Curse' tells you the story of Mary, who had an unfortunate accident eight years ago.

name: Asterix & Obelix: Heroes
description: Original gameplay combining deck building and turn-based combat. 24 heroes from the comic series available for you in this original adventure. To foil Caesar's plans, upgrade your deck and make the right tactical decisions!

name: Project N3T
description: Take control of a test subject tasked with testing out a new device that functions as a powerful magnet. Complete a few tests by moving metal objects and using the magnet as a grappling hook in this short single-player experience.

name: 9th Sentinel Sisters
description: The battle of the clone girls unfolds on a post-apocalyptic Earth, devastated by the alien life form known as "Bleed." Pilot the manned weapon "Father" to eliminate enemies. Upgrade weapons, create powerful builds, and strategize to successfully clear stages.

name: Placid Plastic Duck Simulator: So Many Ducks
description: Placid Plastic Duck Simulator - So Many Ducks brings 27 additional ducks to the pool! Each of them is a brand-new duck you have never met, with a unique personality and, in some cases, new interactions.

name: Project Adder
description: A run & gun zombie-killing rogue-lite with weighty responsive gameplay that’s different every run.

name: TrainCraft
description: A nostalgic, retro train management game.

name: The Fall of Elena Temple
description:
Fall from a ledge, collect the coins below, then undo back to where you fell from, with the coins in your pocket! An old-school puzzle platformer in which you explore rooms, avoid perils and collect all coins to progress. Missed some coins? Fall, collect, undo! Falling into some spikes? Undo!!

Test your forward thinking and logical skills. Plan your falls carefully, as your undos are limited. If you're not paying attention, you'll find yourself unable to restore back to the top, with coins still needing collecting!

Enjoy the retro aesthetics with monochrome pixel art, playing the game on the state of the art handheld GrimBoy (TM) (wink). Reminisce about the good times with lovely pixel art backgrounds to put you right back into your childhood bedroom, the backyard, the park, grandma's living and many more.

name: Schleich Puzzles: Farm World
description: Sheep, cows, pigs, horses, chickens and much more: The exciting world of schleich Farm World in 60 lovely designed puzzle scenes. All puzzles have been carefully designed for children ranged between 3-7 years old.

name: Insanity's Grip
description: Insanity's Grip is a first-person psychological horror game in which the player uncovers the secrets of his forgotten past and experiences nightmares from which he can no longer escape. Be careful, some visions can be more dangerous than they seem!

name: Fresh Force Frustrations: A Gay Superhero Erotic Visual Novel
description: A creature attacks Fresh Force headquarters, leaving the team trapped, unable to get physically aroused, and with a traitor in their midst. Get back your ability to get off! Multiple endings, steamy gay action, plus spandex, tentacles, and more!

name: Ghost Simulator
description: This is the story of a family living in a haunted house in New Hampshire. And you're the one haunting them.

name: Gaia Survivors
description: Control a variety of robots and destroy invaders from outer space in order to save the destroyed earth! "Gaia Survivors" is a 'Shoot 'Em Up' type sci-fi rogue-lite casual game with a retro-futuristic worldview.

name: Forza Motorsport: Premium Edition
description: Forza Motorsport Premium Edition includes the full game with up to 5 days early access, Race Day Car Pack, Car Pass (30 cars delivered to your game weekly, one per week), VIP Membership and Welcome Pack.

name: Flipper Soccer
description: Play a quick game of Flipper Soccer - the game that mixes football with pinball. Control the flippers to score goals against your opponent, who can be your friend or the computer.

name: Stop Dead
description: A rogue AI is hell-bent on destroying its creators and has swept you up in its plans. Use your superhuman abilities to run, jump, slide, and pull hundreds of objects as projectile weapons to blast everything in your path in this funny and chaotic first-person telekinetic brawler, Stop Dead.

name: Hot Girls Delivery Club
description: A silent driver rescues girls from human trafficking. Can he and his operator Greta overcome the main enemy, and find themselves?

name: Dungeons of Eternity
description:
Endless fantasy action and adventure await in Dungeons of Eternity. Band together with up to 3 players or play solo using physics-based weapons and magic in this cooperative action RPG built for VR.

Randomly-generated dungeons constructed from hundreds of different chambers offer endless replayability. Explore dark crypts, ruined castles, deep caverns, solve puzzles, and avoid deadly traps.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Launch Edition
description:
In the ninth century CE, Baghdad is at its height, leading the world in science, art, innovation, and commerce. Amid its bustling urban landscape, a conflicted young orphan with a tragic past must navigate the streets to survive.
In Assassin’s Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice. After an act of deadly retribution, Basim flees Baghdad and joins an ancient organization – The Hidden Ones. As he learns their mysterious rituals and powerful tenets, he will hone his unique abilities, discover his true nature, and come to understand a new Creed – one that will change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

name: Knight vs Giant: The Broken Excalibur
description: Engage in combat against gigantic monsters terrorising the Kingdom of Camelot and defeat them with your Broken Excalibur in this roguelite action adventure with RPG elements.

name: Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic
description: Join Clicky on a new, enchanted adventure in Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic! Search for hidden objects scattered around hand-drawn worlds, and unlock more as you go. With both a single player campaign and an online mode where you can create your own dreamworld, the adventure never ends!

name: Cricket 24
description: Cricket 24 is the culmination of a decade of Cricket video game development and includes teams from every corner of the globe.

name: Wargroove 2
description:
Return to the battlefield, sea, and sky with a cast of new Commanders, using your wits to wage turn-based war! An all-new Wargroove adventure for new recruits & veteran wardogs alike!

Trouble stirs on the shores of Aurania. An ambitious new faction has unearthed forbidden relics capable of catastrophic consequences. But how far will they go to achieve glory? Take to the battlefield, sea, and sky with a cast of new Commanders, using your wits to wage turn-based war!

name: Riley in the Abyss
description: Riley In The Abyss is a stealth action shooter. You wake up as 'Riley'in an underwater facility to research the depths of the ocean. Upon waking up, something is wrong... Everyone is seemingly dead. Sink or swim in this short psychological horror game.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection
description:
Based on Sword Art Online’s War of Underworld anime arc, a new story unfolds with tough challenges that await our beloved hero, Kirito, and his new friends. Players will unmask the Dark Knight and find out if Kirito and the crew will survive the relentless battling against the forces of the Dark Territory!

It’s the perfect game to introduce during SAO’s 10th Anniversary, when everyone can reminisce about their favorite SAO memories while meeting their favorite character again.

The newest installment of the SWORD ART ONLINE video game series comes to next-gen consoles with a cast featuring characters from previous SAO anime.

SWORD ART ONLINE Last Recollection boasts a brand new, original storyline that explores what would have happened if Kirito, Eugeo, and their allies didn’t meet their tragic end in The War of the Underworld.

Experience an exciting and elevated battle system with your friends against familiar foes from the Sword Art Online series!

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Collector's Case
description: Experience the story of Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice as he navigates the bustling streets of ninth-century Baghdad. Through a mysterious, ancient organization known as the Hidden Ones, he will become a deadly Master Assassin and change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

name: The Godfeather: A Mafia Pigeon Saga
description: A mafia pigeon roguelike saga full of danger, adventure and poop! Join the pigeon underworld. Take back the old neighbourhood. Become The Godfeather.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Deluxe Edition
description:
In Assassin's Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions seeking answers and justice. Join an ancient organization and come to understand a new creed – one that will change Basim’s fate in ways he never could have imagined.

The Deluxe Edition includes a Prince of Persia–inspired outfit, eagle and mount skins, weapons, and more!

name: Tagline
description: Tagline is a lightning fast, graffiti based shooter set in a loud, wild world sprinkled with street art, hip-hop, and towering skyscrapers. Parkour and snatch the tags off the walls of this funky metropolis, and overcome an array of enemies and challenges!

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage
description:
In the ninth century CE, Baghdad is at its height, leading the world in science, art, innovation, and commerce. Amid its bustling urban landscape, a conflicted young orphan with a tragic past must navigate the streets to survive.
In Assassin’s Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice. After an act of deadly retribution, Basim flees Baghdad and joins an ancient organization – The Hidden Ones. As he learns their mysterious rituals and powerful tenets, he will hone his unique abilities, discover his true nature, and come to understand a new Creed – one that will change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

name: Bullcrap!
description: Meet Bucky the bull and his no good, untrustworthy farmyard friends! A turn-based bluff card game inspired by the classic game Bullsh*t! Race against your friends to offload your cards. Use wild cards to play dirty and change the rules!

name: Neon Abyss: Infinity
description: "Neon Abyss: Infinity" is a roguelike game that integrates shooting and 2D platform jumping elements.

name: Monos: The Endless Tower
description: Guard the last remaining tower with an array of weapons and magical powers! The horde of monsters coming from down below is relentless and it is your duty to dispatch them in this unique tower defense game!

name: Front Mission 2: Remake
description: Front Mission 2: Remake is a remake of the sci-fi tactical role-playing game Front Mission 2. The Remake preserves the mature story, strategic turn-based combat, and Wanzer customization options of the original. Enjoy the revitalized classic with updated visuals and new features and enhancements!

name: Escort Simulator 2
description: Escort Simulator 2 is an immersive adult RPG playground where you control the look of a attractive escort avatar exploring the hidden pleasures of a secret Polynesian island. Your imagination is the only limit to the potential fantasies to explore in this deep and ever changing erotic universe.

name: I Doesn't Exist
description: Classic Zork meets Existential Crisis. A modern text adventure that explores themes of control, isolation and mental health while levelling up the genre with beautiful pixel art and AI.

name: Knight vs. Giant
description: As the legendary Knight, you must engage in combat against mysterious titanic giants that have roamed and terrorized the Kingdom.

name: Bang-On Balls: Chronicles
description: A quirky, absolutely content-packed, destructible open-world sandbox adventure with combat, platforming, character customization, and collect-a-thon scavenger hunt experience. Play solo, 2-player split screen, or online co-op for up to 4 players. No paid cosmetic DLC nonsense.

name: The Bloodline
description: An open, freeform Adventure RPG that lets you play your way. Reforge bonds between kingdoms, explore the wilds, craft and plan adventures and wield mighty weapons or magic as you prepare for what is to come…

name: Kingdom Shell
description: Kingdom Shell is an atmospheric 2D platformer with a captivating storyline. Explore the local lands to stop the invasion of nightmarish creatures and unravel the mysteries of the Kingdom.

name: Party Poppers
description: Party Poppers follows in the footsteps of Party Golf and Party Crashers but with the brand new adorable Poppers with the same incredible customisation options and crazy competitive couch gameplay you know and love!

name: Little Sisyphus
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty: Warzone - Combat Pack: Shogun
description: Sin descripción

name: The King is Watching
description: In this casual strategy game, you'll be able to defend your kingdom from enemy invaders and gather various resources.

name: Flatland
description: You're exploring a desolate UAC outpost in the middle of an ocean.

name: Pokémon Re:Union
description:
Red, now a legend with many trainers and recognized worldwide, returns to his native region after his journey to become a Pokémon Master.
A journey that ends with a merciless battle on the summit of Mont Argenté against a certain trainer...
But his return was not to be as he had hoped.
A strange phenomenon seems to be appearing in the Kanto region.
Numerous ultra-breaks have begun to appear all over the region.
It is said that a certain policeman by the name of Beladonis is seeking to speak to this legendary trainer as soon as possible, to ask for his help in this matter.
What new adventures await Red alongside Beladonids?

name: Cute Fame: Halloween Bash
description:
3 Endings. 3 Outcomes. 3 People.

(This. The game that is being played. It is a night of deaths. Deaths that may end with you dying. Be careful, As one wrong choice can lead to your death! But, Time to explain this game, I will call it a party, Since that was the location it had happened. An Halloween party)

This game is a visual novel! Most events in this story were meant to be fiction. Although no research has concluded certain events like this never happened to anyone ever. It is also similarly based off the current "Cute Fame" universe, With changes that make some things feel fresh.

name: Shadows of Truth
description: Unravel a plot in New York, play as two detectives who fight to find the truth.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Ultimate Edition
description:
Ultimate Edition Content:
Includes base game, all Digital Deluxe content, and all Character Pass content.

name: Alien Returns
description: Sin descripción

description: Two retro survival horror nightmares overflowing with dinosaurs and zombies!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days - Character Set 09: Sophie Belle
description: Set including Fighter "SOPHIE BELLE" and sleeves.

name: Core Keeper: Shimmering Frontier
description: Explore a glimmering new environment and discover a shining new Solarite ore, taking your Core Keeper experience to the next level with powerful new weapons, armour and equipment. Wield the powerful new Obliteration Ray, a destructive laser drill capable of mining through walls faster than any other equipment in the game, upgrade your gear for the very first time with the build-enhancing Upgrade Station, and take the fight to the Atlantean Worm, a colossal new boss lurking deep below the Sunken Sea.
