description: Set including Fighter "JINKI MUKAE" and sleeves.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days: Character Set 10 - Samuel Fredson
description: Set including Fighter "SAMUEL FREDSON" and sleeves.

name: Old World: Pharaohs of the Nile
description: In the unforgiving deserts of Africa, the Nile birthed powerful empires that shaped the old world. Lead the people of Egypt through over 400 years of history in Pharaohs of the Nile.

name: Way to the Light
description: You are a real digger, having descended down a vertical shaft of a mine, you find yourself in an abandoned tunnel system.

name: Chain
description: Chain is an open world 2d action adventure game inspired by the gameboy era. you will have to explore a vast island with different biomes in search of the seven magical petals, but be careful, the island is under a curse that mixes all the items inside the chests.

name: Model Railway Millionaire
description: Model railway builder with economy simulation. Edit the terrain, build the track, and place all the highly detailed objects to create exciting model railway layouts! Deliver food and row materials to the cities to earn money and expand your world! Be a model railway millionaire!

name: Hidden Prototype Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Western Frontier Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Radio Silent
description: You're a marine that just latched onto a ship that went radio silent for 10 years after entering a wormhole in space. Battle hoards of aliens, upgrade your arsenal, and collect audio logs to discover the chilling history of the ship you've boarded.

name: Welly Wang VR
description: Use VR for what it was invented for, chucking things and hitting other things. Welly Wang VR is an eclectic mix of fair ground style challenges, mixed with off the wall random levels testing your skill and accuracy.

name: Chaos Metaverse
description: free, there will dance, will send skills of beauty and hero butler, there is a character special effects system, there is a dressing system, skin system, and MMO-style shooting, lobby chat, friends system, equipment system, props system, leaderboard system, view the results

name: Survivors of the Mare Vitalis
description: Survivors of the Mare Vitalis is a Rogue-Lite action game, which you can discover unique planets and it's biomes while thousands of animals and uncategorized life forms coming after to kill you!! Earn Credits while destroy them, upgrade yourself and destroy the Ecosystem of each planet!!

name: Trolley Delayma
description: The only way to solve the trolley dilemma is to delay the inevitable fate forever by trapping the trolley in a loop in a series of tiny puzzles.

name: Glais Gawizt
description: Glais Gawizt is team-based action gameplay. This game has features like customization your character or adding equipments and skills to it's gameplay.

name: Grave Digging Me
description: In this casual looter and crafting game, you join as a new grave digger. while expanding the town, graveyard and upgrading your tools.

name: Cassette Beasts: Pier of the Unknown
description:
Charge your oversized flashlights and steel your nerves for "Pier of the Unknown", a new DLC for Cassette Beasts! This DLC download includes:

A new storyline to seek and unravel
A spooky new location with three carnival-themed attractions to uncover and explore
TWELVE new monsters that can only be found and collected within Brightside Pier
Five new character costume options

This new addition to Cassette Beasts brings the total monsters to 141, meaning you can now unlock 19,881 fully imagined fusions!

name: Death Lease
description: You will die.

name: Mannequin
description: Play as a clothing store worker who is just finishing up her shift and preparing to go home. However, as you make your way towards the exit, the power suddenly goes out, leaving you trapped inside the store.

name: Bump and Run Racing
description: Get ready to tear up the streets and smash your way to the finish line! Bump & Run Racing is an ode to classic arcade racers where crashing opponents is not only allowed, but encouraged.

name: Pea Pod Power
description: Explore a colorful garden world in this unique 3D platformer! An evil alien fungus has invaded the planet and seized control of its crops... use your epic Pea Pod Powers to defeat the fungus and recover the sacred seeds before it’s too late!

name: Miss Peach
description:
"Miss Peach" is a pixel stealth strategy puzzle game.
You will play the role of a police officer - Jing Shu, searching for your missing son. During the search process, you are caught up in a strange incident: you are trapped in the house of Duo. Here, investigate more truth while protecting yourself.

name: Dinobreak
description: Dinosaurs have returned in this retro survival horror crisis.

name: DawnOfCombat
description: "DawnOfCombat" is an indie game I'm developing, due on Steam this year. Players navigate a vast universe, battling foes, modifying spaceships, and strategically upgrading with collected coins. Decisions shape each fresh challenge. The game beckons thrill-seekers towards cosmic glory and victory.

name: The Sisters 2: Road to Fame
description:
Get on trend and take the road to fame!
Double the trouble, double the fun, our Sisters are back to cause twice the chaos!

name: Idle Catfarmia
description: Help the cat fairies to arrange resources, produce and harvest crops, and manage the farm. The more efficiently the farm grows, the richer your pockets become. Show some clicking skills to unwelcome visitors who occasionally appear on the farm.

name: A Tiny Sticker Tale
description: A Tiny Sticker Tale is a cozy miniature adventure about changing the world, using the power of stickers!

name: Hag
description: In Hag, players must explore and interact with an innocuous home environment in first person, solving intricate puzzles and an unknown mystery whilst escaping the clutches of a sadistic hag and her morbid son.

name: Royal Razzle
description: A match 3 puzzle adventure set in a whimsical medieval world of candy and princesses. Return to a simpler time when match 3 puzzle games were actually fun and didn't have advertising and in-app purchases.

name: Learn Words: Use Syllables
description: Learn Words - Use Syllables is an exciting mix between a word and a trivia game. Words are split into colorful syllables and you have to put them back together as fast as possible. More than 100 levels with 8 Languages to learn.

name: True Colours
description: True Colours – A Date With Deception starts as a cute visual novel about day-to-day life and the pursuit of happiness beyond a boring work routine, but as interpersonal trust is called into question, a darker side begins to emerge. Be forewarned that you could be seen as the villain of this tangled web, but it’s up to you whether you embrace the role or seek ultimate redemption. Dare to explore multiple story routes and romantic interests leading to 12 possible endings, some good… and some very bad!

name: What in Hell is Bad?
description: What in Hell is Bad? is an adult defense otome game for mobile devices.

name: The Wall Mustn't Fall
description: You will select a hero with unique abilities. As you defend your castle, you will earn money and loot. This will allow you to upgrade your castle and recruit ai controlled allies to synergize with and equip them with weapons and relics. You may also choose to allow the ai to control your hero.

name: Side Bullet
description:
Side Bullet is a free-to-play, side scroll online shooting game.
Choose your cartel and use special skills and weapons to battle monsters and other players to be the last one standing!

name: Heads Will Roll: Reforged
description: Hardcore survival RPG with non-linear story that lets you play as a young medieval soldier who over the course of battles and adventures becomes the most formidable and respected knight of his era. Or, if he’s not lucky enough, perishes in the chaos of the Hundred Years' War.

name: Garden of Seif: Chronicles of an Assassin
description: Garden of Seif is a narrative-driven game where choices matter. Play as Iris Lapis, an assassin navigating a world of danger, adventure, and romance. Two enemy love interests arrive and claim to be trustworthy, but can they win her heart?

name: The Fabulous Fear Machine
description: Everything you’ve ever dreamed of can be yours with The Fabulous Fear Machine, a narrative-driven strategy game with a pulp horror style. Become a Master of the Machine, spread the darkest Legends of urban myth, and let fear rule the world.

name: Thief Simulator 2
description:
Thief Simulator 2 will transport you to a world full of valuables, expensive cars, and rustling banknotes. As long as you find a way to steal them.
Know that a thief's trade is not a piece of cake. In order to get some practice, you'll start with petty theft. This is how you'll gain the experience required to access more and more risky - and most importantly, more profitable - jobs.

name: DotAge
description: Village elder, help us! Build your village and help your Pips, fight off hundreds of events in dotAGE as the prophetic village elder of a small medieval town. dotAGE is the merciless, turn-based, roguelite, town builder. Will you fulfill the Prophecy?

name: Coldy Drinkeria
description: Puzzle game about preparing drinks to the sound of samba. Game made for Enchant Jam #1.

name: Little Magic World
description: Little Magic World for Enchant Jam.

name: Caring & Chilling
description: A game made for Enchant Jam 1.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of Disgaea 7 includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of Disgaea 7
- "The Art of War" hardcover art book
- "The Songs of Honor" 2-disc original soundtrack
- Steelbook
- Mini Byoubu Art Display
- "Netherworld Warriors" Yunomi Tea Cup
- Collector's Box

name: Never Down: Only Up
description:
In this addictive game you have to climb up by jumping and pushing off the floor. You need to be fast and agile to get to the top. The game offers many levels of varying difficulty that will allow you to upgrade your skills and become a real climbing master. In addition, the game has beautiful graphics and sound that will immerse you in the exciting world of the game.

In this game you will test your climbing skills. You must jump and push off the floor to get to the top. The game offers many levels of varying difficulty that will allow you to upgrade your skills and become a real climbing master.

You will experience a real adrenaline rush as you climb walls and jump from one platform to another. The game offers many unique tasks and levels of varying difficulty that will make you feel like a real hero.

Enjoy addictive gameplay and become the best climber! Don't miss the opportunity to experience real adrenaline and become a real climbing master!

name: Ausbruch
description:
Everyone has a reason to come home early.

Help this poor fool get out of prison!
In this long-cherished interpretation of the classic, I let the ball wander through 60 hand-picked rooms.

name: Dash Arena
description: A small arcade game - Exclusively on Playdate

name: Crank & Watch: Ball
description: Act fast and keep the balls up in the air!

name: Godspeed
description: One schoolbus, one ticking bomb, only one way to- forward. Godspeed, a new game for Playdate.

name: Rusty Barrel
description:
Rusty barrel is a short horror game in which you pilot a small, cramped and old submarine. You have to move through narrow openings in gorges on the ocean floor.

The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54 on the theme "Limited Space". Inspired by the game Iron lung.

name: The Lamplighters League: Nocturne
description: Fight darkness with darkness by adding the mysterious Nocturne to your league, a macabre spectrophysicist marooned in an alternate dimension, who returned forever altered. Nocturne manipulates her body’s electric field to inflict Shock Damage on her enemies while also supercharging her cutting-edge suit to enhance her abilities. Count yourself lucky that this mysterious skirmisher is on your side - now you see her, now you’re dead!

name: Turn-Based Battle Bundle: The Amazing American Circus & Legend of Keepers
description: Get two awesome turn-based games: The Amazing American Circus and Legend of Keepers!

name: High on Life: DLC Bundle
description: High On Life and High On Knife: two great tastes that go great together!

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Cosmetic Set
description:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Glasses Costumes Set
- Disgaea Costumes Set
- Magical Girl Magic Knight & Spirit Costumes
- Charming Prinny & Slumber Cat Costumes
- Short-Hair Succubus & Felynn Costumes
- Animal Ear Armor Knight & Witch Costumes
- Gamer Professor & Mecha Girl Costumes
- Nurse Kunoichi & Cleric Costumes
- Oni & Kappa Prinny Costumes

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Complete Edition
description:
Includes the following:
- Disgaea 7 game
- Cosmetic Set
- Special Weapons Set
- Starter Support Set
- Season Pass

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes the following:
- Disgaea 7 game
- Cosmetic Set
- Special Weapons Set
- Starter Support Set

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Costumes Set
description: Adds a set of 7 unique character costumes (from previous games in the series).

name: Johnny Trigger: Avenger Edition
description: In this bundle you get content from the base game and Avenger DLC.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Season Pass
description:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Bonus Story: The Overlord, Demon Lord, and Sheltered Girl
- Bonus Story: The Hothead, Princess, and Dreamer
- Bonus Story: The Honor Student, Final Boss, and Ex-President
- Bonus Story: The Instructor, Steward, and Fallen Angel of Love
- Bonus Story: The Kind Demon, Singing Princess, and Thief Angel
- Bonus Story: The Zombie Sibs and Angel Little Sister
- Bonus Story: The Delinquent, Curry Lover, and Lady Overlord
- Pleinair Completion Bonus

name: Project Wingman: Frontline 59
description: Project Wingman: Frontline 59 immerses players in exhilarating aerial combat, putting them in the pilot’s seat of a war-ravaged Earth’s most advanced fighter jets—and challenging them to prove they have what it takes to become a true ace. Pilots can engage in intense dogfights and large-scale ground assaults across a variety of fast-paced, action-packed game modes and missions, and they will discover the pure adrenaline rush of dodging railguns and geothermal weapons, striking against mechanized fortresses, and skimming the ground with gatling guns and wing-mounted rocket launchers.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Kind Demon, Singing Princess, and Thief Angel
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Killia - Melodia - Artina

name: Stop Burying Me Alive, Beautiful!
description: You wake up to your girlfriend burying you alive, and she won’t be convinced that you aren’t actually dead- one of several problems, it turns out, as you find yourself dealing with rats trying to take a few early bites out of you! And just who is the girl talking to you from underground?

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Overlord, Demon Lord, and Sheltered Girl
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Pleinair Completion Bonus
description: Adds Pleinair as a playable character and save icon.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Special Weapons Set
description: Adds a set of 9 types of weapons that will help your characters grow.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Zombie Sibs and Angel Little Sister
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Zed - Bieko - Sicily

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Honor Student, Final Boss, and Ex-President
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Mao - Desco - Axel

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Hothead, Princess, and Dreamer
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Adell - Seraphina - Fuka

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Delinquent, Curry Lover, and Lady Overlord
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Raspberyl - Usalia - Girl Laharl

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Bonus Story: The Instructor, Steward, and Fallen Angel of Love
description: Adds a story featuring the following 3 characters. Once completed, you gain them as playable characters and save icons. - Valvatorez - Fenrich - Flonne

name: Wing Dog
description: Get ready for an action-packed endless adventure in Wing Dog! Fly through the skies and collect power-ups to fight off the incoming barrage of opponents, consisting of fighter jets, mines, and blimps. Can Wing Dog rescue his city and defeat the evil and corrupt army and their plan to conquer the world?

name: Elder Story
description: Welcome to the fascinating world of Elder Story, where every step is a journey through nature and human life.

name: Disgaea 7: Glasses Costumes Set
description: Adds a set of 7 unique character costumes (glasses).

name: Synergia: NextGen Edition
description: At the end of the world, love is sometimes the ultimate crime. Now remastered in high resolution, also featuring the SUNRISE expansion and bonus OST and in-game Artbook.

name: Call Sign is Magic Liner
description: Call Sign is Magic Liner is an old school Shmup with a new twist. You can strategically draw lines and defeat your enemies.

name: Heaven Attack!
description: Gabriel comes to wake up Michael sleeping in his room in heaven. It's my turn to look around today. Let's start before Metatron gets angry.

name: Evade VR
description: Evade VR is a unique arcade game in which you have to take the battle in outer space. You will have to fight the bots, dodging their shots and meteor showers. In battle you will help, an extensive arsenal of weapons, abilities and bonuses, combine them and earn as many points as possible.

name: SpaceRace
description: Futuristic 3d racing game where players compete to set the best time on visually striking tracks.

name: BloodMoon
description: Survive the BloodMoon's horrors! Multiplayer horror game where teamwork is crucial. Run, hide, and escape to outwit relentless evil.

name: Emzombed
description: Emzombed - You must kill all of the Zombies and solve the mystery of the island.

name: Eseala
description: As Eseala, you navigate misty cliffs and forgotten pockets of time, uncovering knowledge of the past, present and future.

name: Friends Play Pool
description: Invite your friends to play pool. Optimised for Steam Deck

name: Hidden City Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Ioo
description: A minimalist pixel-art single-player game focused on the exploration of a procedurally generated world. Try to finish the goal of surviving 100 days in this unknown world while you gather rare resources from any of its 30 biomes.

name: Rawisland
description: You have to go to a desert island and find hidden treasures. Crafting items and unique upgrades scattered throughout the island will help you survive.

name: Reapers
description: A card battle game set in a dystopian universe, focused on deck building, resource management and trading.

name: Battleship
description: A modern Naval warfare game.

name: Unsolved Case: Above the Law - Collector's Edition
description: Nothing brings people together as well as a common grief or crime! Can you bravely confront a criminal puppeteer with no legal defense?

name: Tatari: The Arrival
description: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?

name: Blitz Guard
description: Embark on an indie souls-like game! Master the unique Parry Gauge system, where successful parries fill the meter, but beware: a failed parry or taking damage will deplete it. Show your skill and strategy to unleash powerful abilities in epic battles!

name: Idle Space Navy
description: A sci-fi idler. Upgrade your ships, get new items, and conquer the stars.

name: New World: Rise of the Angry Earth
description: A new threat looms over once-familiar lands. Wield a new weapon, new ability, and new allies in the form of rideable mounts to fight a growing menace that threatens to consume all of Aeternum!

name: Spirit of the Island: Adventureland
description: Rejoice, Adventurers: A brand new way to entertain your guests is coming up to the tropical world of Spirit of the Island. Please welcome: Adventureland! Are you ready to build your own tropical amusement park?

name: 100 Halloweens
description: Trapped in a mansion filled with 100 years of darkness... Fight or hide, stay alive and set things right.

name: Only Multiplayer: Up!
description: Get set to defy gravity, leap like never before, and experience the exhilarating world of parkour in a whole new light! This isn’t just your ordinary parkour jump simulator - it’s a dynamic ONLINE MULTIPLAYER adventure that transforms your every move into a gravity-defying spectacle.

name: Viral
description: Stylized sci-fi FPS shooter

name: Just Find It 3
description: Explore hidden variations and engage with exciting new challenges in Just Find It 3!

name: Afterlife
description: Be the main character, and show your strategy to protect the village by stopping monsters attacking it in the afterlife and to get back to where you were.

name: Warf
description: Unleash strategic survival in Warf, where you guide Warf through relentless hordes. Shape paths, deploy towers, and engage in thrilling combat. Defend against the horde and emerge as the ultimate survivor in this innovative fusion of survival action and tower defense.

name: NHL 24: X-Factor Edition
description:
NHL 24 X-Factor Edition includes:

-Dual Entitlement
-3-Days Early Access
-4600 NHL Points
-Exclusive Cale Makar Player Item
-HUT Power Up Icon Choice Pack
-WOC Battle Pass XP Modifier (x5)

name: Forest Spirit
description: Tired of office life, you go to live in nature. In this new life, you have to build, craft, farm, fight and interact with the locals.

name: RBM Studio's Gettysburg
description: A historical hexagonal turn-based strategy wargame using markers to represent units designed by the legendary Mark Herman. Throwback to the great hex-based wargames of the 70's and 80's. Solo and online multiplayer modes are supported.

name: Save City R
description: Introducing "Save City R" – an adrenaline-pumping game where you take on the role of a courageous team of tank fighters on a mission to liberate the сity of R from the grips of the notorious criminal organization known as "Shai Guu".

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Growing Light
description: Patch 6.5 introduces: new main scenario quests; the third installment from the alliance raid Myths of the Realm, Thaleia; a new trial, The Abyssal Fracture; a new dungeon, The Lunar Subterrane; a new Crystalline Conflict map, The Red Sands; a new Variant and Criterion dungeon, Aloalo Island, and more sidequests and sidecontent.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Ski Jumping PVP
description: Experience the thrill of being a ski jumping champion! Step into the shoes of a professional jumper and engage in exciting competitions against players from across the globe. Take on authentic ski jumps inspired by real-world locations.

name: Basics In Intermediate Filmmaking
description: Basics In Intermediate Filmmaking is a pre-apocalyptic puzzle horror. You explore an abandonded power plant in order to document what happened to the infamous Fortitude Electric power company. Use your camera to solve different puzzles around the facility, and try to survive.

name: Sugar Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Magician's Cat Diary
description: You are a magician living in seclusion in a modern big city. You live by running an old flower shop. One day, you saved a Feral cat from falling from the roof with the magic of the wind. Since then, in addition to raising flowers, several naughty kittens have gradually entered your life

name: Survivor: Castaway Island
description: Do you have what it takes to outplay your mates and become the sole Survivor? Explore a deserted island where you can only rely on instinct and strategy to outlast competition and survive on the island.

name: The Lamplighters League: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the exclusive Nocturne agent, a Digital Art Book highlighting the inspiration and design behind The Lamplighters League, and the full game soundtrack from award-winning composer Jon Everist. Take on the Banished Court in style!

name: Silent Hope: Day One Edition
description: The Day One Edition of Silent Hope is a physical release in a special box that comes with the base game, a 100+ page artbook titled "The Art of Silent Hope" and the games soundtrack CD with 33 songs.

name: Synergia: Sunrise
description: One year after the events of the Synergia Incident, Cila and Mara's lives have drastically changed, as have the lives of all those around them. This DLC is a small glimpse into their future outside of The Empire, and the repercussions of their actions during the main game.

name: High on Life: High on Knife
description: High on Knife is set two years after the ending of the main game, where you and your talking weapons go on an adventure because Knifey received a package from home.

name: Dungeon Rebound
description: Dungeon Rebound is the perfect blend of nostalgic arcade gameplay and immersive RPG elements, offering a fresh and exciting take on both genres. Are you ready to rebound your way to victory and become a legend in the realm of Dungeon Rebound?

name: Station to Station
description: Station to Station is a minimalist & relaxing game about building railway connections. Grab your conductor’s hat and bring the voxel-art world to life through the magic of trains!

name: Ignistone
description: Ignistone is a roguelike game in which players must devise a combination of weapons and amulets to progress through a dungeon. Whether you prefer attack power, durability, or special moves, find the combination that suits you best.

name: Jane Austen's 8-bit Adventure
description: Play as Jane Austen, English novelist, in this 2D platforming adventure. Explore 8-bit England, fight enemies with your quill, and confront characters from Jane Austen's novels!

name: The Lamplighters League
description: Sneak, steal, and shoot your way through a world of pulp adventure in The Lamplighters League! Globetrot across a variety of exciting locales around the world and outwit your enemies in strategic turn-based combat - and, if you play your cards right, you might just save the world.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Deluxe Edition
description:
The next chapter in the Disgaea saga. In Disgaea 7, the story is set in a world called "Hinomoto Netherworld Cluster," which is inspired by Japanese culture.

The Deluxe Editions includes:
- The physical game
- Digital soundtrack
- Mini art book

name: Iron Dungeon
description: Iron Dungeon combines a twin-stick shooter, a 2d platformer, and a roguelite. Explore a dangerous underground complex searching for dozens of weapons, gadgets, and upgrades to find a way to the surface and discover if there is still life on Earth!

name: Gehinnom
description: Gehinnom is a multiplayer horror game for 1-4 players. (Demo is single-player only). Collect clues and complete quests to perform a ritual and banish the demon that hunts you. Everything in Gehinnom is randomly generated, so you will always be scared.

name: Ira
description: A character-based shooter with roguelike elements, IRA celebrates the artistry of what shooter fans call “bullet hell”: enemy projectiles that weave intricate, geometric patterns across the screen and force you to seek out the precarious safe spaces between them. Set in an Eastern-influenced fantasy world marked by ethereal beauty as well as grave danger, it’s a procedurally generated action game that requires skill, inspires strategy and rewards patience.

name: AgarIO Hub Rebirth
description:
An agar-style game with many new features and social profiles.

The original AgarIO Hub, created by BielSAA in October 2015, was shut down in early 2019. In October 2023, the community recreated the game to allow everyone to relive their nostalgia.

The game is now owned by Py9 and Chance.

name: Spacetour Express
description:
The Spacetour Express travel agency is here to provide the best destinations in the Milky Way.

Send tourists, scientists or military personnel to various planets, earn prestige, money and research tokens. But take care of your ships, as sending them to hostile planets may result in dramatic endings.

Oh also, try not to dissatisfy too many of your loyal customers, or else you might see some stowaways crawl up your ships...

name: Crab Wave
description:
Game created to take part in the Enchant Jam.

Crab Wave is a top-down twin-stick shooter with leveling up systems and permadeath. In the game, you control a crab armed with a gun. That's pretty much it.

name: Samba Hero
description: Feel the samba rhythm by pressing the notes at the right time and become the next Samba Hero! Do you have what it takes?

name: World Weaver
description: Confront the World Weaver

name: A House for Alesa 3
description: One year after the events of A House for Alesa 2, Alesa and Greta decide to move away from the city and buy a house in a nice small rural town. However, unbeknownst to them, something wicked is taking place in the town. Now, the worst nightmare imaginable is about to begin...

name: R-Type Final 2: B-99 Apocalypse R-Craft
description: Sin descripción

name: Half of Our
description: Sin descripción

name: Sheep in Wolf's Clothing
description: 'Sheep in Wolf's Clothes' is a short interactive visual novel, where you collect sheep that got stolen.

name: Cold and Unforgiving
description: A submission to Ludum Dare 54, Cold and Unforgiving follows four young adults as they venture through the wilds of northern Michigan in search of a rumored ghost town. However, when it starts to get dark, they're left to make a decision that will change their lives forever.

name: Snowlord
description: In this minesweeper-like game made for Ludum dare 54, player must dig snow to build castles while avoiding getting caught.

name: Super High School Danger Course
description: Survive through 85 courses of fire, mines and other things that could only reasonably be described as "gameplay complications" in this game only for the Playdate.

name: R-Type Final 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Soar to new heights and save big with the R-Type Final 2 Ultimate Edition which includes the base game, all DLC sets, Soundtrack, Art Book, and more.

name: Sex Simulator: College Girls
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of a university professor who gets busy with his female students.

name: Packed to the Gills
description: Deep-sea train-catching simulator made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54!

name: The Final Prize is Soup
description:
Survival-horror yuri visual novel.

After a disastrous break up, Qian Hailu wakes up to find that she's dead. Luckily (or unluckily), she's been given a chance to turn back the clock and avert her death—as long as she can pass three rounds in the game of life.

name: Thrall
description: To be enthralled by love is murder on the soul in this paranormal, point-and-click, otome visual novel.

name: Cracking the Cryptic: Lines Variety Pack
description: A new variety pack featuring many different line variants!

name: Windowkill
description: Windowkill is just your normal shoot-em-up, but something’s wrong with the window….

name: Minecraft: Nerf World
description: Gear up for an epic Nerf x Minecraft adventure! Dive into a world of foam-flinging fun as you blast your way through hordes of Minecraft mobs, and unlock dimension-themed arenas. Jump into the blocky chaos and charge towards victory, it's a Nerf battle like never before!

name: Bury Your Gays
description: The teen slasher movie every 80s lesbian deserved.

name: Haunting Hollow
description: Haunting Hollow is a new episode of spooky gothic maps for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Madfarmer: Lost Kingdoms and Crazy Critters
description: In a lost kingdom, accompany a crazy farmer as he overcomes challenging platforms, solves puzzles and collects stars with the help of adorable critters, but be alert for the evil oranges.

name: HordeFighter 2D
description: Challenge yourself to see how long you can last against endless waves of enemies, and discover hidden areas by completing tasks. Use the souls of your slayed enemies to unlock permanent upgrades to help you survive longer each run.

name: Rolling Toolman 2 Deathly Traps
description: New rolling toolman game. Try to reach finish fast and avoid deathly traps

name: Stress testing
description: This is a challenging horizontal game that showcases a resilient spirit of challenge！

name: Embers: Return to Dragonland
description: Save your legacy from the goblins by embodying legendary dragons in this cooperative twin-stick shooter action.

name: Foggy Rainfall Escapade
description: Foggy Rainfall Escapade is a 2D indie platformer, invites you into an enchanting adventure. Follow a young adventurer's journey through mesmerizing visuals and soothing melodies. In a world of serene beauty and calm foggy rain, he embarks on a quest to find his way back home.

name: The Windows Are Gone
description: Haunted by grief and guilt after a tragic accident, you start seeing a house in your dreams. No matter what you do, you can't get its image out of your mind. You feel it calling for you, so you answer it.

name: My Ex-future Family: Premium Edition
description:
This version contains two additional features:
1) Cheats — you may control changeable parameters of character and girls with legal tool. It helps to open all pathes and scenes.
2) Events — when you play MEFF you would have your favourite scenes. This feature helps you to repeat all sex events from the game per one click.
3) Walkthrough (in game folder)

name: Sushi for Empress Setsuko
description: “Sushi for Empress Setsuko” is a cozy fishing game, yuri dating sim, and point & click adventure set in a fantastical Japan-inspired land. Follow Mizumi Nagashima as she travels around the Empire, seeing gorgeous views, catching delicious fish, and charming beautiful women.

name: Fishyphus
description: Traverse an impressionistic sea, listening for predator and prey. Cast a lure and feel their cues to reel them in. The reaper slowly tracks your movements, who you must outmaneuver to survive.

name: ScooMart
description: ScooMart is an indie horror game that plunges you into a meticulously crafted world filled with dread and suspense. As the protagonist, you stumble upon the gas station while on a dreaded road trip. What begins as a routine stop for gas quickly turns into a nightmare of supernatural proportions.

name: Oni Station
description: Oni Station is a horror game with roguelike and arcade elements where you pilot a train to outrun the creature chasing you. Carefully plan which stations to stop, search for resources and, above all, how far can you survive?

name: Nurtopu
description: It is a rabbit game for collecting 2d diamonds. 2d hyper casual platform game.

name: StanÇact: Sexy Tenacious Girls
description: 『StanÇact』is a cute and sexy girl-on-girl Shoot'em up. Mai, a military officer, is on her way to quell a riot, but the rioters and the military have teamed up and are on the rampage and the head of the military was the ringleader.Witness one woman's struggle to complete her mission amidst the chaos!

name: Cosmos: Stella Returns
description: Cosmos: Stella Returns is a metroidvania that will bring you to the mysterious planet of Memoria. Shoot, jump, collect materials and new items in this action-platform with a vintage flavor!

name: The Legend of Ogorets 2: Tsundere
description: An interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Do not read in the dark.

name: Bomber Party
description: Experience an explosive and nerve-wracking adventure! Eliminate other players, strategically use bombs, collect power-ups, and survive to earn trophies. The first player to reach the required number of trophies wins the game. Are you ready to triumph as the last survivor? Let's go!

name: SCP: Nemesi
description: SCP: Nemesi is a multiplayer survival-horror game where one player takes on the role of the SCP (anomalous creatures, each with its own abilities and appearance), and the other four players play as Humans, each with their own personal goals and tasks that may branch into different paths.

name: Engaging Destiny
description: A fantasy platformer where you can explore the town of Faranel and its surrounding areas. Meet the townsfolk, interact with them in various ways and maybe even have some special fun with them while you're at it!

name: Sunlight Scream
description: The hero moves to a new city because of life circumstances. Upon entering university he makes new friends, he is horrified to discover that one of them is a murderer... And your decisions alone will determine the outcome of this story!

name: Ezerath's Last Hope
description: A dungeon crawler, beat em' up RPG with an open world for you to explore.

name: Highland Panic
description: Highland Panic is a fast-paced, Scottish/Highland-themed card game with solitaire mechanics for 2-4 players. Race to be the first player to play all the cards from you "panic" pile to the common "clan" piles. It's a thrilling game of strategy and skill, perfect for game nights and parties.

name: In His Time
description: This is a 2D adventure game of puzzle solving. As you control Ollie, a young boy, use your head to overcome the many obstacles that stand in your way. To obtain items, you may need to persuade characters or win mini-games. Through these, players will get to know the world even better.

name: Dinky Guardians
description: The Dinkys are defenseless and the Zumbys are coming, join up with your friends (or by yourself), gather resources, build a colony with automated machines and keep the Dinkys safe!

name: You are the Judge!
description: As a judge of the Kobardde court, solve complex cases inspired by actual events. Your decisions will directly affect people's (and perhaps yours) lives. You may have to make difficult decisions for your family, country, and life. What kind of judge will you be?

name: Road Domination
description: A casual action game. Player drives around a city, capturing streets and districts, avoiding police cars, and using traps to get away. When all areas are seized, the player captures the neighbourhood and wins current level.

name: Death Unphased
description: Death Unphased is a challenging precision platformer where you phase through walls, spikes, and enemies with your dash. A short arcade-like experience with the goal of beating your fastest time in each level. Flex your puzzle-solving and speedrunning abilities as you forge the best path to the exit door.

name: A Promise Best Left Unkept
description: Harry finally made a huge breakthrough in his quest for success by scoring a major deal for his company, but what he didn’t foresee is that this would unintentionally invite an undesirable presence into his life. The representative of the subcontracting company—his old bully from high school.

name: My Ex-future Family
description: My Ex-Future Family is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of human life. The game is packed with humor, sex, romance and plot turnings. Play as a young man who seduces girls who surround him, complete tasks of the Principal and build your life in house of your family!

name: Quasimorph
description: Take on a role of a hardened PMC fighter in a dark turn-based extraction RPG. Engage in unforgiving combat, manage your ship and pile up the bodies of your clones to unravel the dark mystery behind threat to all life.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Episode 1 - Manhunt
description: A tactical action platformer where you play as Vlad “the Impaler”, the historical Dracula, the Lord and Voievod (war commander) of Wallachia. With your knights, you explore medieval Romania (Wallachia, Transylvania and Moldova) castle by castle, to hunt down your enemies!

name: Pact of the Ancients
description: Pact of the Ancients is a 3D Bara Action RPG game about a group of mercenaries who set out on a mission in search of easy money and discover not everything is as easy as it seems.

name: Sunwave Hotel
description: Dive into a sexy sci-fi adventure that combines Point and Click with Dialogue Choices. After crash landing during a dangerous job, you and your partner must get back on your feet. Along the way, you'll solve problems and meet new friends to help you before your luck finally runs out.

name: Stardander School for Witches
description: Welcome to witch school! Learn spells, solve mysteries, make friends, and battle (or befriend) Fae creatures in a turn based battle system. Will you become the witch who defeats the malicious enemy who has laid siege to the world?

name: Tricky Typing
description: Compete against your friends in this Absolutely Ridiculous Typing game! Using every single button on your controller (and then some), your typing skills will be put to the TEST as you type out each letter to compete in this Extravaganza >:)

name: Strange Investigations: Becoming
description: A Strange New Beginning!

name: Bilkins' Folly
description: Percy’s on a quest to find his missing relatives, and he needs your help! Join him and his beloved dog Drayton as they adventure through a series of unusual islands, solve puzzles to uncover valuable treasure, and bring to light the foreboding family secret buried beneath it all.

name: Ion Fury: Aftershock
description: Ion Fury, the old-school first-person shooter, keeps the bullets and cybernetic body parts flying with Aftershock, a new expansion. Like classic expansions, “Aftershock” offers a brand new Arrange mode. Whether playing for the first time or revisiting Ion Fury, choose Arrange mode to experience the original game but now enhanced with new enemies, weapons and more.

name: Eric & Yannik X
description: Sin descripción

name: Axl Fangame
description: This is a Megaman X fangame. It involves Axl shooting at Metalls.

name: Clash of Clans: Clash-O-Ween Season
description: It’s another new Season stacked with perks and rewards! Unlock the Ghost Champion skin with this month’s Gold Pass, and get ready for a spooktacular Clash-O-Ween season...

name: Reel Me In
description:
You're a high school troublemaker who was caught committing a petty crime. During your winter break, you had two options: fish trash out of a polluted river for a week or pay a hefty fine. Being as broke as you are, fishing it is. Luckily, you’ve been paired with two cute guys! Not-so-luckily, something doesn’t seem quite right with this water… Well, it’s probably nothing. Let’s hope you can "catch" a date with one of the boys by the end of the week before your community service is over!

Reel Me In is a short horror dating sim visual novel… with fishing?
Made for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2023.

name: Disconnect
description: Late-night call with your friend keeps on DISCONNECTING. What'd you do if your friend wasn't who you thought they were?

name: What The Floosh Game
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in "What The Floosh Game", a dynamic, action-packed game that will challenge your skills and reflexes! Navigate through a universe full of obstacles, collect precious coins, and challenge yourself in different difficulty levels. With vibrant graphics, intuitive controls, and an immersive soundtrack, each match will be a unique and electrifying experience.

name: Rolled: A Pinball Nightmare
description: A pinball horror adventure game. You will bounce and ping your way through a nonlinear world in hopes to get back to the life you were living before.

name: Smasher
description: Welcome to SMASHER. You play as Trinity Tritone, a guitar wielding metal head who has a huge gig at the end of the day and a problem to solve before she gets there- she doesn't know how to play guitar. Enter the most unlikely guitar teacher...

name: Blank Relish: Remastered
description:
Embark on a journey alongside Private Marian, who lost everything during his crash on an unknown planet, devoid of companionship and lacking his equipment... Will he survive the challenge and come back home?

Experience Marian's struggle for survival and finding purpose amidst the isolation of the unknown planet.

name: The Rewrite Journal
description:
"The Prince's lie could only last until the twelfth hour."

On an island in the sky, five friends live out near idyllic lives. But one of them is distanced from the others; separated by time. To get back into their lives, he makes a wish. Except even the most simple of wishes can backfire when their story excludes yours...

name: The Little Match Girl 4: Crown of Pearls
description: In The Little Match Girl 4 by Hans Christian Andersen, a prince has been born, and the titular little match girl must assemble the subtitular Crown of Pearls.

name: Conexo
description: Conexo is a game inspired by Connecting Wall TV show by BBC Only Connect, and by Connections by NYT.

name: CrossGunr D+
description:
An update to CrossGunr:

- New Graphics and Adjusted Music
- Less slowdown, smoother gameplay
- New EX mechanic ( bubbles ) - no bar gained during EX's, will make it a bit harder but still tuned to perfection!
- Repair Locator
- Boss Healthbars
- Score differential
- 5 Scores saved on cart
- Restart Run in Menu (For when the run is forfeit..
- Reset Scores in Menu

name: Shimizu Ritual
description: Ayaka Nakamura, a respected student at school, harbors a dark secret as she secretly bullies Emi Shimizu, a girl who is interested in the Occult. One day, in what seemed like a normal day for Emi, she summons a devil that can grant her any wish. What will she wish for? Will it be revenge, or something else?

name: Assembly
description:
Today has been an extraordinarily long day. You picked up the keys to your new apartment in the morning, you went shopping for furniture in the afternoon, and you've spent the evening putting it together.

And you're almost finished -- there's one box left.

ASSEMBLY is a story of magic and adventure. Can you assemble a small table? Can you save the world from the vengeance of ancient gods?

name: The Vambrace of Destiny
description: A light dungeon crawl. Tap spell gems to defeat monsters!

name: Dr Ludwig and the Devil
description:
Join esteemed mad scientist Dr Ludwig as he faces the greatest challenge of his nefarious career: making a deal with the Devil and coming out on top.

Research demonology! Read legal documents! Face off against the world's least effective torch and pitchfork-wielding mob! All this and more!

name: No Time for Mercy
description: "My best friend came back after six months. There's someone else in her skin."

name: Lake Adventure
description: A metafictional text adventure game by BJ Best. In-universe, written by young Eddie Hughes in 1993, and annotated by Ed Hughes in 2020.

name: Antony & Cleopatra: Case IV: The Murder of Marlon Brando
description:
The year is 2021. Neo-America is prospering under the stern yet wise direction of President for Life, Gaius Julius Ceasar. 330 million souls live, love, and laugh, all working tirelessly for the glory of the American people! But with light comes darkness. With prosperity comes misery. And with law comes crime. Heinous crimes! Shocking crimes! Cunning crimes! And sometimes, very rarely, crimes so devious, so shadowy, so slippery that only Neo-America's greatest detectives can hope to solve them.

For these crimes, the very worst of crimes, America has a special team. Two individuals, both alike in dignity, in fair DC, where we lay our scene. Their names: Antony and Cleopatra.

He's the Vice President.

She's the Queen of Egypt.

Together, they fight crime!

Note that this is a fully synchronous two-player game and requires two people and internet access to work. You cannot download this game and play it offline.

name: Compilation of 10 Line Basic games
description:
Find 2 exclusive games coded in 10 lines of Basic Locomotive!

They demonstrate the power and effectiveness of this fabulous Basic and its Text mode!

name: Bichiro in a Cave
description: Bichiro, don't go there!

name: My Brother; The Parasite
description: A story about a corpse, a complicated sibling relationship, and the things we forget. Made in Twine. Written, coded, and illustrated in three weeks for the Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Garden Rush
description: Garden Rush is a PVZ2 mod that defines itself on being interesting, unique and a change of pace from your traditional Plants vs. Zombies 2 mod. We have Abilities, Hero Plants and all sorts of other minor changes you won't see in another mods.

name: Mega Dystopia Micro Architect
description: MDMA City-builder puzzle game for Playdate console

name: Solaris Arcana: The Eye of the Soothsayer
description: Discover the source of power: The Solaris Arcana

name: Witcharoo
description: Your life as a cat is turned upside down after being kidnapped by a crazy witch..!

name: Head Over Heels: Monster Girl Dating Sim
description: A dullahan goes to a speed-dating event: Will she fall head over heels or trip up on her chances for love?

name: ProtoViolence
description:
Can a scientist save a test subject from her life’s work?

All documents enclosed relate to ██. ██████ and █████████’s history within the Youth Training and Development Initiative (YTDI)’s child cybernetics and processing program. Unauthorized release of any information constitutes an unacceptable risk to stop’s reputation and will result in immediate termination and potential incarceration.

These documents were recovered from Stop backup servers from previously corrupted data. They pertain to the incident that occurred at YTDI Facility #001 on Oct. 1st, 207█, and record the events from ██. ██████'s first arrival at the facility to the date of the incident.

name: Dreamwalker
description:
This game was made as a part of the Tirana Game Jam Edition 1.0, where the theme was "Dreams".

This game is a blend of "The Lemmings" and "Monument Valley". You are in control of the sleepwalkers and you must get them to bed safely and securely. You do so by giving them traits with which they can traverse the environment.

name: Shared Beauty
description: Shared Beauty is a dark fairy tale about jealousy, friendships lost, and aging, set in a fictional medieval German village.

name: Sea Fever
description:
Sea Fever is a horror visual novel with blood, gore, abusive relationships, and monsters. Dive in, but beware!

Marella and Dylan are girlfriends who live a quiet and self-sufficient life in paradise. But Dylan's dreams and ambitions are greater than a little house by the sea, and she is drawn to the city to pursue her acting career.

Now, bound together only by letters, Marella must face not only the pressures of keeping up a long distance relationship, but a strange and growing sickness, and dark monsters from the only place she's ever considered home.

Can Dylan and Marella's relationship survive? And what, exactly, is the monster plaguing her nightmares?

name: Boil Noodles at Night
description: Late night noodle aquisition and cooking simulator.

name: Homecoming: My Monster-Hunter Girlfriend
description: A short linear visual novel about love, mental-health and werewolves. Developed for Spooktober VN Jam 2023.

name: Reaplaced
description: A supernatural Halloween whodunnit. Solve a chilling locked-room mystery before the grim reaper reveals the answer!

name: Today is the End of the World
description:
Today is The End of the World.

And so was yesterday. And the day before. And it will be tomorrow.

Today is The End of the World, and everyone is coming to your backyard tonight to watch it happen. There's just one problem: your best friend Echo is missing, and it is your job to find her.

And tomorrow, she will be missing. And tomorrow, you will find her.

She’ll remember, but you won’t.

name: Pokémon Crystal Legacy
description: A Pokemon Crystal ROM hack that provides a fresh and balanced adventure while maintaining the original spirit.

name: Football Life 2024
description: Football Life 2024 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on PES 21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: The End is Never the End
description: "The end is never the end" is a visual novel made by Purechito.

name: I Love My Follower (Count)
description:
You are an Eldritch horror, summoned to the human realm.

You’re soon to realize, however, that you have more in common with your followers than you thought - they, too, have a longing for The Void.

The Void in their case is, however, mostly something they call ‘y2k’ and ‘retro anime aesthetics’.
But oh well, every god needs clout.

Build your church, gain followers, give away miracles.

Romance your head priest. Or don't.

name: Pina Colada
description:
Pina Colada is a set of 23 maps by a small team of mappers from the Pineapple Under the Sea discord server. These maps were created with the following requirements:
1) No more than 75 monsters per map.
2) Maps should be short, dense, and interconnected.
3) Maps should contain a death exit on Ultra-Violence difficulty

name: Beary the Hatchet
description:
It's Halloween 199X, and you killed someone during your morning shift.

Honestly it's inconvenient. This job was imperfect, sure, but you got to wear a mask with no questions asked and the pay was livable. But now you'll have to keep the body in the backrooms till your shift is done. Bummer.

name: TNT Goes Boom!
description: A 32 map replacement using TNT Evilution aesthetics for each map.

name: The Delirium Dimension
description: The Delirium Dimension is a 13-map experience draped in minimalist classical horror atmosphere complete with an excellent soundtrack assorted from vintage horror bangers.

name: Virtual Mom: Job Simulator Manager
description: You are a true superhero, balancing between raising children and a successful career. You'll have to overcome numerous challenges, starting from the moment the morning sun rises...

name: White Hat
description: White Hat is a bullet hell roguelite where you upgrade the game, not yourself, to progressively increase the difficulty. Earn points on runs that you can use to add more waves or research gameplay modifiers. Upgrades make the game harder, but increase your score multiplier.

name: Your Train 2
description: You can operate trains more and more with your own train schedule! Train routes all over Japan and Taiwan, with a total of more than 50 routes!

name: Cube Battlefield: 2048
description: A rogue-like top-down shooting game with infinitely generated levels. Grow a army of cubes with different abilities to break down enemies into smaller units. Make your cube army more powerful each time you are reborn.

name: Riot of Willy
description: Is a horror game with an adventure twist. Your task is to solve puzzles and not to get caught by monsters. They all hear and see you, so be careful. Explore the locations and survive in this thrilling horror game

name: Drift Legends 2: Car Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Zed Patrol
description: Zed Patrol is a co-op 3D top-down zombie shooter that puts you in the middle of a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Your squad's mission: to take out the four bosses and retrieve the keycards to save the city. But with hordes of zombies around every corner, it won't be easy!

name: Mech vs. Bugs
description: In Mech vs Bugs, you'll pilot a mech to fend off alien insects on remote planets. Combining intense top-down combat with strategic looting and crafting, your goal is to liberate the galaxy, one insect-infested planet at a time. Ready for your thrilling, third-person adventure?

name: Stop Sign Sprint
description: A simple, web browser game.

name: Heroic Tale Value!+
description: Calling all the heroes! Take control of a party of adventurers and embark in this dungeon crawling journey through three different scenarios!

name: Phantom Zone Daimons
description: Just a few toes into the future. Yomori-shi, a town full of strange happenings. And Ayamu Jinnai is just an ordinary girl. Except that she is a powerful medium and has the ability to see spirits. She and her occult-enthusiast sister, Makoto, are determined to fight the bizarre.

name: Death's Playground
description: Enjoy scaring your friends or other players so much they might get a heart attack or try to survive from the horrors of the haunted locations in this Asymmetrical Multiplayer Psychological Horror Game! Death's Playground brings the single-player horror games experience into the multiplayer world.

name: Jelly Express
description: Jelly Express is a two player co-op physics game. You will be playing two little jellies who will deliver boxes over obstacles to reach their destination. The only tool you have is a wooden board overhead, so use your ability to stretch, jump, and move to keep the boxes steady on the board.

name: Lewd Girls, Leave Me Alone! I Just Want to Play Video Games and Watch Anime!: Hentai Edition
description: You're a REAL GAMER. But are you tough enough to turn down a sexy girl? Dating sims are full of lies, these girls will do anything to keep your date from falling through!

name: Noch
description:
Go alone (or with a friend) to find the girl who destroyed the world. An ominous surreal first-person adventure full of dangerous monsters and secrets of the deceased world

Let's start!

Imagine… Night. You’re in a car, lost among endless forest on a highway. Perhaps you will desperately try to escape... Try not to lose hope. You were in hurry to get somewhere. But does it matter now?

After all, Lisa has already destroyed the world and our reality has become unsteady, like a dream. All around, or maybe only around you, was an unimaginably thick sparkling black-blue haze with no end. The worst thing happens - an animal being scared to death by jumping to the road from the forest.
Crash. You are alive. You have to get out of the broken car and face what the time-changing reality has prepared for you. Welcome to the worst! And remember, waiting for dawn is useless, but death will not bring salvation...

Can you survive if the nature of things as they are is destroyed? And what will you do if you meet the one that is hard to remember and impossible to forget? The one responsible for the endless night and darkness?

Your adventure begins!

name: NSMB2: Mushroom Madness
description: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Mushroom Madness is a small modification of New Super Mario Bros. 2 for the Nintendo 3DS. It features 1 and a half worlds of brand-new mushroom-themed levels exploring some fresh environments and interesting mechanics that haven't been seen before.

name: Curse of the Juniper Tree
description: Sin descripción

name: Our Dollhouse
description:
Maite (renamable) wakes up in a strange, windowless room, unaware of how she got there. She soon discovers that she was kidnapped by a mysterious person, and she's not alone.

A young man has been trapped here with her, and seems just as confused as she is. They work together to find a way out, but the more time passes, the less inclined to escape her companion seems to become… Soon enough, he begins to suggest they should both stay here—together, forever, in the dollhouse.

name: Metaflora
description: Metaflora is a daily guessing game in which players aim to figure out a mystery plant. Each incorrect guess will reveal information about how close that guess is to the taxonomic classification of the mystery plant.

name: Pinball M: Duke Nukem's Big Shot Pinball
description:
Hail to the King baby!

We couldn’t be more excited to reveal the next pinball table coming to Pinball M, the game that will haunt pinball players in their worst nightmares!

name: Space Rescue in Jupiter
description:
In the year 2070, the Earth's energy resources are not sufficient for the great demand of a booming overpopulation; new technologies and materials have allowed the extraction of energy in the upper layers of Jupiter's atmosphere. From time to time, accidents occur in the mining-energy complexes that exist around the planet. Your mission is to rescue the miners if necessary. Control the descent of your ship, avoiding the clouds of overheated plasma, to land on the platforms and collect the capsules to take them to the space station.

This game has a basic concept, it is made in Basic 1.0 with additions of machine subroutines, it consists of 5 levels and has an ending.

name: Model Employee
description:
Model Employee is a corporate horror visual novel where players take control of the latest individual amongst millions to start working in one of Tethys' online shopping labyrinthine warehouses. Just discharged from the hospital and massively in debt for their life-saving cybernetics, the player-character must adapt to the "extreme" work-life balance of a Tethys Team Member- but they have help.

Penny, the artificial personality that controls all security, waste disposal, and employee surveillance in the facility, specializes in reinforcing an especially cutthroat variety of workplace culture- and she's taken an interest in you.

With a vibrant cast, PC-98 inspired visuals and multiple endings, Model Employee is a modern horror story that'll stick with you long after you've clocked out of your shift.

If you want to get ahead in your career, you gotta be willing to take some risks.

name: 3D City
description: 3DC offers a vibrant urban sandbox, blending Sim City's strategic city-building, GTA 5's open-world exploration, and Assassin's Creed's parkour narratives. Dive in, shape the metropolis, and embark on thrilling missions in a stunning environment.

name: Tunnel Vision
description:
Take control of Suoni V Linnet
(choice of voice & pronouns)
In this eerie, atmospheric, narrative-driven horror adventure made in 1 month for Spooktober VN Jam 2023.

name: My Little Guessy
description: Guess the episode from a random My Little Pony screencap, featuring frames from Friendship is Magic, Make Your Mark and Tell Your Tail.

name: Umbrella Drop
description: Use umbrellas to slow your fall

name: Wings
description: Skilled and fun flying!

name: Burdock
description:
When you've lost your way and nearly lost your life, will your name be enough to buy it all back?

Burdock is a dark and atmospheric fairytale with fae creatures, riddles, and danger abounding. Will you be able to navigate the perils you face and reclaim your life? Or will the mists swallow you up for good...?

name: Crowd City: Complete Edition
description:
Gather people across the city and beat your opponents with your excellent leadership. The more people you run into, the bigger your crowd becomes!

Complete Edition Features:
- 7 maps to run on
- 40+ skins to make your crowd look even cooler
- Additional 2000 coins
- Crowd upgrades
- Amusing gameplay
- Ear-catching music
- Easy controls so anyone can play
- Simple rules and lots of fun!

name: Yorigami Market
description:
This game is a derivative work of Touhou Project.
In short, it is a short RPG in which HP has been replaced by money.

name: Marrow
description:
Tchernobog lays dead, his form fading away from the world as Caleb turns his back to the smoldering corpse. Vengeance sated, he leaves the Hall of the Epiphany behind. Feeling no less disdain for the world than he did with Ophelia, and experiencing none of the joy she brought, he returns to the grave to die once more. A hopefully final resting place.

The Cabal had been scattered far and wide by the gunman's path of revenge, but in his absence they regathered, regrouped, motivated out of their own sense of vengeance. Caleb was their general, the chosen one of their dark god and he had betrayed them all twice over.

He must burn for rejecting the honor of being sacrificed, for striking at Tchernobog. This suffering is best repaid by the tongues of Cerberus. Gathering his remains, the diaspora cinders of his pit, they enacted plans to resurrect him, and sought out Caleb's newfound grave, and bring him face to face with a fiery end.

name: Memories
description: Memories is a map of medium length, about 15-20 minutes, with a strong emphasis on atmosphere.

name: Pumpkin Jam
description: Pretty large very Halloween-themed map for Doom 2 for limit-removing ports. Features new spooky appearances for some of the enemies, although they are all functionally the same. The only exception is arachnotron who has smaller hitbox to fit his new sprites and also slower movement speed to compensate for that.

name: Red Zero
description:
A horror visual novel where you play as a sleep deprived university student and their anxious adventure with exams, Halloween and... zombies?

Created in a month by Nova SWARM

name: Wild Sex: Wet Girls
description: Welcome to the captivating world of the game WILD SEX: WET GIRLS! Immerse yourself in the thrilling setting of the Wild West, where you face the most dangerous challenge - survival in a world overrun by zombies

name: Cum & Climb
description: The higher you climb, the more undressed your companion will be! Choose one of the two and start to Cum and Climb! The most realistic animations and 3D models are waiting for you!

name: Spy Racing
description: A "driving" game of sorts. You can move left and right, and a bit forward and back. Don't collide with other cars, and collect as many disks as you can.

name: Project Cartaphilus
description: Sin descripción

name: Zarie: The Story of Sin
description: What kind of conversation will you have with the Shinigami girl? How will you conclude your story? The choice is yours in this tale of sin and 'the girl'.

name: Cyberpunk: Red-Light District
description: Cyberpunk Red-Light District is a game for adults set in the world of Cyberpunk.

name: Spielbahn
description: Spielbahn is a small relaxing game that lets you unleash your creativity by designing and building your own tracks using various parts and decorations.

name: Baby Climbing
description: baby climbing is a 3d third person game where you control a baby in a dream where you have to climb platforms in order to reach the end. climb the platforms and complete the mission without falling and overcoming the obstacles

name: Qiyun's World
description: This is an adventure game with a first person perspective. Qiyun is a device that allows users to enter the spiritual world of others So as to awaken the memory system of the amnesiac A series of interesting adventures occur in the process of attempting to awaken 127 memories .

name: Olho Spectral
description: An RPG game following the style of the nineties classics. Turn-based battles, 3D scenery and pixelated graphics. Two worlds in parallel dimension to be explored. Dungeons full of puzzles and sinister monsters to defeat.

name: Doodle World: Redrawn
description: Doodle World Redrawn is new, never before released, re-imagining of Doodle World with tougher levels, enemies, and bosses! Use the new double jump ability to navigate through these tougher levels. "Kids Mode" is still available in this new version, so even younger players can enjoy this new game!

name: Dungeon Tale
description: Adventures in the random dungeons, with a AI parters and healers, looting items from ordinary to legendary levels. and after full level, there will be Heroic and Legendary dungeons, or even epic raids of world bosses awaits.

name: Verdict: Descent
description: Establish your written character in a world of many. Roleplay with others in the city of Galvia, exploring six Courts with distinct themes and mechanics. Along the way, meet other characters that you'll have to befriend or battle!

name: Wall protection
description: Protect the kingdom wall. Summon mighty warriors! Each type of warrior has its own characteristics, some attack from afar, some slow down, some heal.

name: UFO: Extraterrestrials Platinum
description: UFO: Extraterrestrials PLATINUM is a new edition that includes a number of changes and enhancements that give the player a new perspective on the classic game: new alien species, heavy weapon platforms, heavy mortar fire, crash site bombardment, unique items, global UFO swarms and configurability.

name: The Groom of Gallagher Mansion
description: Hunt down a beheaded ghost to save your college club from losing funding! It'll be a piece of cake— wait, what do you mean he wants to marry you!? The Groom of Gallagher Mansion is spooky comedic romantic visual novel full of laughs and scares all around!

name: Fate of New Albans
description: Engage with the townsfolk and native people to make decisions and choices, your actions will decide the fate of New Albans. With multiple endings, solve puzzles, speak to NPCs and explore the land in this story adventure.

name: Road to Salvation
description: Road To Salvation is a stylized action adventure game. This is where the world is ruined. Your daughter, who was the only thing that connects you to this difficult life, has been kidnapped. Fight to save, do you have the courage to negotiate? You may even have to die. Can you do these?

name: Harpoon Shooter! Nozomi
description: Shoot the harpoon and pull the enemies! Pull them in close and defeat for a higher score. For beginners, collect sweets instead of beeing attacked. You can enjoy retro and kawaii pixelarts, and deep game mechanics.

name: Dragon Kingdoms: A Legend's Beginning
description: Dragon Kingdoms: A Legend's Beginning is an RPG that seeks to recapture a long-gone era when games were more than just graphics and FMV cutscenes. It takes place on a world that has been nearly torn apart by a war that happened long ago, between thirteen races, of which only a few remain.

name: The Search for a Colour Palette
description: Play as Mr. Colourfool, a father looking for his son that is lost in the castle that recently appeared out of thin air. The colours are all gone, and there is a voice beckoning you towards the castle. Perhaps it is fate, or just your imagination...There is nowhere else to go anyways.

name: Deputinization
description: Deputinization is run and gun action game focused on boss battles. The game features pixel graphics and music that is rooted in Ukrainian culture.
